Jesus in, Ka nu, a hibale, ka suapui te kua te ziam? ci in zo kik hi.
Taciang a kim a pam a to te en in, En vun, ka nu le ka suapui te!
Banghangziam cile a kuamapo Pathian deina a seam peuma sia, ka suapui le ka nu a hihi, ci hi.
Jesus tuili hui ah thuhil kipan kik hi: a kung ah mihon tampi te hong ki kaikhop ciang in tuili sung ngunkuang sung ah tuak in to a; mihonpi te sia tuili hui ah om uh hi.
Tasiaciang sontena te zang in thuhil a,
Ngai vun a; en vun, thaici poaipa khat thaici poai tu in pai hi:
Tabang a poai ciang in, thaici pawlkhat te sia lampi ah tak a, tungleang te hongpai in ne siat hi.
Pawlkhat te suang tam na mun ah tak a, lei tawm a hi man in thaici te hong po pai hi, banghangziam cile lei thuk ngawl hi:
Ni hong sua ciang in, nisa in kang a; zung tha ngawl ahikom ngawtak hi.
Pawlkhat te sia lingphung sung ah tak a, lingkung te a khan ciang in deapcip in, nga zo ngawl hi.
A dang te sia lei pha na tung ah tak hi, taciang po in hong khang a, a nga hong nga hi; pawlkhat te a se sawmthum, pawlkhat te a se sawmluk, pawlkhat te a se zakhat dong in khang hi, ci hi.
Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Zak natu bil a nei peuma in za tahen, ci hi.
Ama nguak a om laitak in, a nungzui sawmleni te taw a om te in sontena thu dong uh hi.
Jesus in amate tung ah, Pathian kumpingam thuku heak theina hong pia zo hi: ahihang a puasang a omte tung ah, tua thu te theampo sia sontena te taw son hi:
Amate in mu tu hi napi, a he bua tu uh hi; ngai tu hi napi, a tel thei bua tu uh hi; tabang hi bua le hun khatpo ah amate ki kheal in, amate i mawna ki maisak tu hi, ci hi.
Jesus in amate tung ah, Hi sontena te he ngawl nu ziam? taciang sontena theampo bangbang in tel thei tu nu ziam?
Thaici poaipa in Pathian kammal poai hi.
Lampi ah a tak thaici te thu sia hibang te a hihi, amate in Pathian kammal a zak uh ciang in Satan manlang tak in hongpai a, amate thinsung pan Pathian kammal te laksak hi.
Suang tam na mun ah a tak thaici te sia hibang te a hihi; amate sia Pathian kammal a zak uh ciang in thakhatthu in lungdamna taw sang hi napi;
Amate sung ah zungtha ngawl ahikom, tawmvei sung bek khom hi: Pathian thu hang in haksatna le vawtsiatna a thet ciang in, thakhathu in pukkik hi.
Lingsung a tak thaici te thu sia hibang te a hihi, Pathian kammal za napi,
Hi leitung thinngimna, hauna i theamna, nadang tampi te lungngul nate tum in Pathian thu sia deapcip ahikom, a nga toai ngawl hi.
Lei pha na a tak thaici te thu sia hibang a hihi; Pathian thu za in sang a, pawlkhat te a se sawmthum, pawlkhat te a se sawmluk, pawlkhat te a se zakhat in a nga hong toai hi, ci hi.
Jesus in amate tung ah, Khuaimei sia khum nuai ah, a hibale, lupna nuai ah koi tu in ki keng ngei ziam? meivak na tung ah a ki koi tu hi ngawl ziam?
Banghangziam cile a ki lang ngawl tu in phualcip thei bangma a om ngawl bangma; pualak ngawl tu thuku zong om ngawl hi.
Zak natu bil nei theampo in za tahen, ci hi.
Jesus in amate tung ah, Na zak thu uh kidawm vun: ngualdang nate uh bangma in noma zong hong ki tekik tu hi: taciang a za te a tamzaw hong ki piakik tu hi.
Banghangziam cile a nei te ki pia thua tu a: a nei ngawl te a neisun ki laksak tu hi, ci hi.
Jesus in, Pathian kumpingam sia, a lo ah thaici poai tu hi;
Taciang mu in, le tho in a, sun le zan in thaici bangbang in po tu le bangbang in khang tu ci a he ngawl thaici poaipa taw kibang hi.
Banghangziam cile leitang in ama thu in ngasak a; a masabel in a te meangsak hi, tua zawkciang vui a, a vui zawkciang a tang hong suak hi.
Ahihang anlak hun hong thet ciang in, ama in phiau taw manlangtak in at hi, banghangziam cile anlak hun cing zo hi,
Jesus in, Kumpingam sia bangtaw sonte tu khi ziam? a hibale bangtaw tekak tu khi ziam?
Hisia in ankam cii taw kibang hi, lei ah a poai ciang in thaici dang theampo sang in no zaw hi:
Ahihang a poai zawkciang in hong khang a, an te theampo sung pan a lianbel hong suak hi, van a vacim te a lim ah tawlnga thei zadong in a bak te nei hi, ci hi.
Amate i zak thei tuh in sontena tampi taw thuhil hi.
Sontena kihel ngawl in amate tung ah thuhil ngawl hi: taciang amate bek a om uh ciang in a nungzui te kung ah tua thu te son thiang hi.
Tua ni nitak sang in, Jesus in a nungzui te kung ah, Ngalkhat ah pai tawng, ci hi.
Amate in mihonpi te a paisak zawk uh ciang in, Ama sia nungzui te in ngunkuang taw paipui hi. Tua mun ah a dang ngunkuang no te zong om hi.
Tasiaciang huipi suangval nasiatak in hong tho a, tuihual te in ngunkuang sia nuaicip ahikom, ngunkuang sung ah tui hong dim hi.
Jesus sia ngunkuang nungsang kham in mu hi: amate in phong uh a, Syapa awng, ka thisiat tu uh phamaw hong sa ngawl ni ziam? ci uh hi.
Jesus hong tho in, huipi tei hi, taciang tuipi tung ah, Thim in, ci hi. Taciang hui thim in, dai dide hi.
Jesus in nungzui te kung ah, Banghang in hibang lalawm in lau nu ziam? bangbang lalawm in upna nei ngawl nu ziam? ci hi.
Amate lau mama uh a, hisia pa sia bangbang mihing ziam, hui le tuipi in a thuni hi? ci in khat le khat kici uh hi.
Amate tuili ngalkhat Gadarenes ngam theng uh hi.
Jesus ngunkuang sung pan a pusua pociang, than pan in hongpai doai vei khat taw kisi hi,
Ama than ah om a; kuama in hen thei ngawl a, thikkol taw nangawn in khit thei ngawl hi:
Banghangziam cile thikkol le saikhau taw tu le tu khit uh hi kale, saikhau te bot tan in, thikkol te santham hi: kuama in zualsak zo ngawl hi.
Sun le zan in, mual tung tatuam le than ah om a, au tawntung in, ama le ama suang taw ki kui hi.
Ahihang a khuala mama na pan Jesus a mu ciang, hong tai in bia hi,
Taciang a nging tak in au a, Jesus awng, nang, a sangbel Pathian Tapa, nang taw bang kisai na nei khi ziam? Nong vawtsiat ngawl natu in Pathian min taw hong ngen khi hi, ci hi.
Banghangziam cile Jesus in ama tung ah, Nang doai ngilo, hisia pa sung pan in pusuak in, ci hi.
Jesus in, Na min kua ziam? ci in dong hi. Tua pa in, ka min sia Legion hi, banghangziam cile ka tam mama uh hi, ci in zo kik hi.
Ama in tua ngam pan hawlkhia ngawl tu in thum hi.
Mual te taw a ki nai na mun ah vokhon tampi anne keukho hi.
Doai ngilo te theampo in, vok sung ah tum tu in hong sawl tan, ci ngen uh hi.
Tasia pociang Jesus in paisak hi. Doai ngilo te pusuak a, vokhon sung ah tum uh hi: taciang vokhon te liang pan in manlang tak in tai uh a, tuili sung ah tuita in thi siat hi. Tua vok te tul ni kiim pha uh hi.
Vokcing te tai in, khuapi le ngam sung ah son hi. Mipi te tabang thu piang te en tu in hongpai tek uh hi.
Amate Jesus kung ah hongpai uh a, legion a kici doai ngilo vei pa sia puansil in, a thin ciim in a to mu uh hi: amate lau mama uh hi.
Tua thu a mu te in doai ngilo vei pa le vokhon tung ah thu piang te ngualdang tung ah son uh hi.
Tasiaciang amate in Jesus sia amate ngam pan pusuak tu in ngen uh hi.
Jesus ngunkuang sung a tum ciang in, doai ngilo vei ngei pa in, Ama taw kikop tu in ngen hi.
Ahihang Jesus in zuisak ngawl a, ama kung ah, Na inn ah cia tan a, na lawmte kung ah, Topa in nangma atu hong vawtsak te bangza in lian ci le, na tung ah hesuakna a nei nate son in, ci hi.
Tua pa zong pai in, Decapolis ngam sung theampo ah Jesus in ama atu a vawtsak nate bangza in lian ziam, ci thu te tangko hi: a za theampo in lamdangsa uh hi.
Jesus sia ngunkuang taw ngalkhat ah paikik a, mi tampi te a kung ah hong ki kaikhawm hi: Ama sia tuili nai na ah om hi.
Taciang, en vun, Jairus a kici synagogue lampui khat Jesus kung ah hongpai a; a mu ciang in a peang ah bok in,
Ka tanu sia a thi dektak in lum hi: hongpai tan a tung ah na khut nga tu in hong ngen khi hi, tasiaciang ama dam tu a; nungta tu hi, ci in nasiatak in thum hi.
Taciang Jesus in paipui a; mi tampi in zui hi, a kiim a pam pan phul ngawp uh hi.
Taciang kum sawm le kum ni sung thisuak numei khat,
Syavuan tam mama kungah ki lak zo a, a neisa theampo zang siat zo hi kale, dam tuan ngawl bekdom ngawl in lawmawk seseam hi,
Jesus thu a zak ciang in, mihon sung ah a nung pan pai in, a puan tham hi.
Banghangziam cile, a puan thamtha po leng dam tu khi hi, ci hi.
Takhatthu in a thi suak kang a; tua natna pan dam khi hi, ci phawk hi.
Jesus in, a sung pan vangletna pusuak hi, ci he lian ahikom, mihonpi sang ah kiheak in, A kua in ka puan hong tham nu ziam? ci hi.
A nungzui te in, mihonpi in hong phul ngawp mu nginge napi, banghang in, kua na tham nu ziam na ci? ci uh hi.
Jesus in a puan tham sia nu mu nuam in a kiim teng en hi.
Ahihang numei nu in a sung ah thu piang he ahikom, lau le ling kawm in, Jesus mai ah pai in bok a, thu piang theampo a man in son hi.
Jesus in a kung ah, Ka ta nu awng, na upna in hong damsak zo hi; thinnuam in pai tan a, vawtsiat na pan in suakta ta in, ci hi.
Jesus a pau laitak in, synagogue lampui pa inn pan in hongpai te in, na tanu thi zo hi: banghang in syapa nawngkaisak lai ni ziam? ci uh hi.
Tua thu Jesus in a zak pociang, synagogue lampui pa kung ah, Lau heak in, um bek po in, ci hi.
Jesus in, Peter, James le a suapui pa John simngawl kuama zuisak ngawl hi.
Jesus synagogue lampui pa inn a thet ciang in, nasiatak in kap le tau in ngamlum lialua mu hi.
Amate kung ah hong sungtan ciang in, Banghang in ngamlum lialua in kap nu ziam? numeino sia a thi hi ngawl hi, a mu hi, ci hi.
Amate in Jesus selno in nuisan uh hi. Ahihang amate a vekpi a puasang ah pusuaksak siat a, numeino i a nu le pa le a paipui teng bek sam in, numeino nu lupna mun inndoi sung ah tum tek uh hi.
Taciang Jesus in numeino a khut pan len in, Talitha kumi, ci hi; a khiakna sia, numeino, tho in kong ci hi, a cinopna hi.
Taciang numeino sia thakhatthu in hong tho a, lampai hi; ama sia kum sawmleni kiim hi. Amate in lamdangsa mama uh hi.
Jesus in, hi thu te kuama hesak heak vun, ci in nasiatak in vaitha hi; tua nu i neak tu khatpo a piak natu in thu pia hi.
Jesus tua mun pan in pai a, Ama khua ah theng hi; a nungzui te in zui uh hi.
Sabbath ni a thet ciang in, synagogue sung ah thuhil kipan hi: a za mi tampi te lamdangsa in, hi thu te koisung pan in nga ziam? ama tung ah a ki pia pilna sia bang pilna ziam, bangbang in vanglian nasep te a khut taw seam thei ziam? ci uh hi.
Ama sia Mary tapa, James, Joses, Judah le Simon te suapuipa, lettama pa hi ngawl ziam? a suapui numei te zong ziak ma ah om hi ngawl ziam? ci in, a sang thei bua uh hi.
Ahihang Jesus in amate tung ah, Kamsang khat sia ama khua, mealheak suapui le, ama inn simngawl mundang ah ki upat hi, ci hi.
Tua mun ah cina tawm te tung ah a khut nga in a damsak simngawl, a vanglian nasep dang bangma seam thei ngawl hi.
Amate up ngawl na hang in Jesus in lamdangsa hi. Taciang ama a kiim a pam khuapi te ah pai in thuhil hi.
A nungzui sawmleni te a kung ah sam a, ni tek in sawl hi; doai ngilo te zo tu in vangletna pia hi;
A khualhaw na mun uh ah ciangkhut bek keng tu a; thung, anluum le sumbawm sung ah sum te keng ngawl in:
Peangdap bul tu le; laktong sil ni keng ngawl tu in thupia hi.
Ama te kung ah, Na tum na uh inn ah tua mun pan na paikik uh dong, tam vun.
A kuapo a hi zong note hong sang nuam ngawl le na thu uh a ngai nuam ngawl peuma tua mun pan na pusua kik uh ciang in, amate langpan tu tetti tu in na peang leihui thin vun. A tatak kong ci ciang, thukhenna ni ciang in tua khuapi sang in Sodom le Gomorah te thuakna thuak nop zaw lai tu hi, ci hi.
Amate pai uh a, mihing te ki sikkik tu in thuhil uh hi.
Amate in doai ngilo tampi hawlkhia uh a, cina tampi te zong sathau zut in damsak uh hi.
Jesus sia muntheampo ah a minthang a, Herod kumpipa in a thu a zakciang in; tuiphumpa John thina pan thokik hi, tua hang in a vanglian nasep te lak thei hi, ci hi.
A dangte in Elijah hi, ci uh hi. A dang te in kamsang khat hi, a hibale kamsang sung pan khat papo hi, ci uh hi.
Ahihang Herod in a zakciang in, hi thu sia a ngawng ka tan John thina pan thokik hi, ci hi.
Herod in a nau Philip i zi Herodias sia tenpui a, tua Herodias thu hang in, ama vateak in mi sawl a, John man in thong ah khum hi.
John in Herod kung ah, na naupa zi na tenpui sia ngeina om ngawl hi, a ci hang a hihi.
Tua ahikom Herodias in John mu thei ngawl in that nuam napi; that thei ngawl hi:
Banghangziam cile Herod in John sia mi thutang le mithiangtho hi, ci a heak hang in lau hi, ama in keamcing in, a sep sa tampi te lungdamtak in ngai hi.
Hunpha a thet ciang in, Herod in a suani ah, ama i to te, ngalkapmang te le Galilee ngam uk ulian te atu in nitak an vak hi;
Herodias i ta nu tum in, a lap ciang, Herod le a kiim a to te a lungkimsak mama hi, tua ahikom kumpipa in ngaknu nu kung ah, na dei theampo hong ngen tan, kong pia tu hi, ci hi.
Nong nget theampo, ka kumpingam a lang a hi zong kong pia tu hi, ci in kamciam hi.
Tasiaciang ngaknu nu a nu kung ah pai a, bang ka ngen tu ziam? ci hi. A nu in, tuiphumpa John lu ngen in, ci hi.
Ngaknu nu hongpai kik pai in, kumpipa kung ah tuiphumpa John i lu sia pakandal sung ah a manlang in nong piak tu ka dei hi, ci in ngen hi.
Kumpipa sia khuangai mama hi kale; a kamciam na sa le a kiim a to te hang in, ngaknu nu nget na nial ngam ngawl hi.
Taciang kumpipa in mihing that te khat sawl in paisak pai a, John lu puak tu in thupia hi: taciang mihing that pa pai a, thonginn sung ah John ngawng tan hi,
Taciang pakandal taw a lu puak a, ngaknu nu pia hi: taciang ngaknu nu in a nu pia hi.
Tua thu John nungzui te in a zak ciang in, amate hongpai uh a, a luanghawm la in than ah vui uh hi.
Sawltakte Jesus kung ah hong ki kaikhawm uh a, amate i vawt te le a thuhil na uh theampo son uh hi.
Jesus in amate tung ah hibang in ci hi, Hongpai tavun, senneal sung ah a tuam in tawmvei tawlnga tawng, ci hi: banghangziam cile a pai le a cia mihing tam mama a, amate anneak hun zong nei ngawl hi.
Taciang amate ngunkuang taw a tuam in senneal sang ah pai uh hi.
Mipi te in amate pai a mu uh ciang in, mi tampi in Ama he uh ahikom, khuapi theampo sung pan in peang taw hongpai tek uh a, amate kantan in, a kung ah hongpai uh hi.
Jesus hong pusua ciang in, mitampi a mu ciang, a cing nei ngawl tuuhon taw kibang uh ahikom khuangaihuai sa hi: taciang amate thu tampi hil kipan hi.
Nitak sang ciang in a nungzui te a kung ah hongpai a, hi mun sia senneal ngam hi, khua zong niam zo hi:
Amate paisak in a, kiim le pam khua tatuam ah pai in, amate neak tu anluum lei tahen: banghangziam cile amate neak tu bangma nei ngawl hi, ci hi.
Jesus in, Note in amate neak tu pia vun, ci in zo kik hi. Taciang amate in, koma pai in dangka za ni man an lei in, amate neak tu pia tu hong sawl ni ziam? ci uh hi.
Jesus in, Anluum bangza nei nu ziam? pai vun a en vun, ci hi. Amate in a heak uh ciang, lum nga le ngasa ni, ci uh hi.
Jesus in a vekpi in lopa hing tung ah a hon a hon in to tu in thupia hi.
Taciang amate, pawlkhat zakhat, pawlkhat sawm nga ci bang in a hon a hon in to tek uh hi.
Jesus in anluum nga le ngasa ni te a lak zawkciang in, vandak to a, thupha a piak zawkciang, anluum te bal in, a nungzui te mai ah lui hi; ngasa ni te zong amate theampo hawmsak hi.
Amate theampo in ngilva tak in ne tek uh hi.
Amate in anluum le ngasa a val te tawm uh a, bawm sawm le bawm ni dim hi.
Anlum a ne teng pasal tul nga kiim pha uh hi.
Mipite a ciasak uh laitak in, a nungzui te ngunkuang sung ah tumsak pai in, ngalkhat Bethsaida ah paikholsak hi.
Amate a paisak zawkciang in, mualtung ah thungen tu in pai hi.
Nitak sang ciang in, ngunkuang sia tuili laizang ah om a, Jesus ama nguak mualtung ah om hi.
Amate sang ah hui hongpai ahikom a nungzui te in ngunkuang sia haksa tak in hot uh hi: zingsang nai thum le nai luk ki laklaw kiim in, Jesus amate tung ah tuili tung ah lampai in, amate kantan tu bang in kithoai hi.
Ahihang amate in tui tung ah a lampai a mu uh ciang in, thitha sa in, au ngawp uh hi.
Banghangziam cile a vekpi in mu uh a, amate lungmang mama uh hi. Tasia pociang Jesus in amate paupui a, Thinnuam in om vun: Keima khi hi; lau heak vun, ci hi.
Jesus amate kung ngunkuang tung ah ka to a, a sung ah a thet ciang in; hui zong thim hi: taciang amate sonzawk ngawl zadong in lamdangsa uh hi.
Amate in anluum taw kisai nalamdang thu phawk ngawl uh hi, banghangziam cile amate a thinpui lei uh hang a hihi.
Ngalkhat a thet uh ciang in, Gennesaret ah hongpai uh a, tuihui ah ngunkuang khit uh hi.
Amate ngunkuang sung pan a pusua pociang, mipi te in Jesus a hi hunlam tel pai uh hi.
Tasiaciang tua ngam kimkot theampo ah tai uh a, Jesus om hi, ci a zak na mun uh ah, cina te a lupna uh taw hong pua tek uh hi.
Jesus a tum na mun khua theampo, khuapi te le lo lam theampo ah, amate in cina te lampi tung ah sial uh ah, a puanmong tham tu in ngen tek uh hi: a tham tha theampo in damna nga uh hi.
Tua zawkciang in Pharisee te le thukhamhil te honkhat Jerusalem pan hongpai uh hi.
Amate in Jesus nungzui pawlkhat te khut silngawl a ninpui taw anne a mu uh ciang in, mawsiat uh hi.
Banghangziam cile amate ngeina a zui Pharisee te le Judah minam theampo, khut sil ngawl in anne ngei ngawl uh hi.
Amate sumbuk pan a cia uh ciang zong, khut a sil bua uh le anne ngawl uh hi. Thu dang tampi a zui uh te, hai, beal, danbeal le sabuai ci bang te zong sil tawntung uh hi.
Tasiaciang Pharisee te le thukhamhil te in ngeina te zui ngawl in, banghang khut sil ngawl in anne ziam? ci in dong uh hi.
Jesus in amate tung ah, Isaiah in phatak in noma a k ihitheamsak te thu a sonkholna a atsa bangma in, hi mite in a muk uh bek taw hong upat uh hi, ahihang a thinsung uh sia kei kung pan khuala uh hi.
Ahihang amate in mihing thupiak te sia ki hil na phabel atu in zang uh a, a lui thathong in kei hong bia uh hi.
Banghangziam cile, Pathian thupiak te vawk in, mihing te i ngeina beal le hai te sil ngeina zui zaw nu hi, tabang thudang tampi te zong vawt nu hi, ci in zo kik hi.
Jesus in amate tung ah, Na ngeina uh na zui thei natu uh in, Pathian thupiak te nial thal nu hi.
Banghangziam cile Moses in, na nu le na pa zakta in; a pa a hibale a nu a hamsiat peuma, thina thuak tahen:
Ahihang note in, khatpo in a nu, a hibale a pa kung ah zatakna tu in van a nei te, hisia Corban hi, hisia letsong hi cinopna hi, Pathian kung ah piaksa hi: ci po le ama peng tu hi.
Tabang in a pa, a hibale a nu atu in a vawtsak tu te vawt nuam nawn ngawl nu hi;
Na ki hil sawn uh na ngeina uh te zang in Pathian thu sia vang nei ngawl suaksak nu hi: tabang in na vawt uh dang tam mama lai hi, ci hi.
Jesus in mihonpi te a vekpi in a kung ah sam a, Note sung pan khatsim in hong ngai tavun a, tel thei tavun:
Mihing sia a puasang pan in a sung ah a tumsuk te taw a nin om ngawl hi: ahihang a sungsang pan apusuak thu te in ninsak hi.
Khat po in zak thei na bil a nei le, za tahen, ci hi.
Jesus sia mihonpi te kung pan in innsung ah a tum ciang in, a nungzui te in sontena taw kisai in thu dong hi.
Jesus in amate tung ah, Note zong tel thei tuan ngawl nu ziam? Bangpo a hi zong a puasang pan mihing sung a tum sia in ama ninsak ngawl hi, ci sia tel thei ngawl nu ziam;
Banghangziam cile a thinsung ah tum ngawl in a ngilpi sung ah tum a, taciang awng dum sung ah an theampo ki thiangsak hi ngawl ziam?
Tasiaciang Ama in, Mihing sung pan a pusuak sia in, tua mihing ninsak hi.
Banghangziam cile mihing thinsung pan in, ngaisutna pha ngawl, palngul mawna, paktatna, tual that,
Nguta, duhop na, ngitlona, theam na, maizum heak ngawl na, el na, sonsiat na, kiphatsakna, mawmawt na:
Hibang a pha ngawl theampo sia a sung pan a pusuak te hi a, mihing ninsak hi, ci hi.
Tua zawkciang Jesus tua mun pan in ding a, Tyre le Sidon ngamngi sang ah pai in, innkhat sung ah tum hi, kuama heak tu zong dei ngawl hi: ahihang bucip thei ngawl hi.
Banghangziam cile, doai ngilo vei numeino khat i nu in Jesus thu a zak cing, hongpai in a peang ah bok hi:
Taciang a tanu sung ah doai hawlkhiatsak tu in ngen hi; tua nupi nu sia Greek minam hi a, Syrophenician ngammi a hihi.
Ahihang Jesus in, Tate ngilva phot tahen: banghangziam cile tate i anluum laksak in, ui piaksak tu ngeina om ngawl hi, ci hi.
Tua nupi nu in, hi hi, Topa awng: hima kale, tate sabuai pan anneng tak sabuai nuai pan ui in ne thei hi, ci in zo kik hi.
Tasiaciang Jesus in a kung ah, Tua a kampau na hang in, pai tan a; na tanu sung pan in doai ngilo pusuak zo hi, ci hi.
A inn a thet ciang in, a tanu sung pan doai ngilo pusuak zo a, lupna tung ah a lum mu hi.
Jesus sia Tyre le Sidon ngam kiim kot pan pai kik a, Decapolis ngam huam sung teng kantan in Galilee tuili theng hi.
Taciang amate in Jesus kung ah nangong le a pau thei ngawl pa khat hong paipui uh a, a tung ah khut nga tu in ngen uh hi.
Jesus in tua pa sia mihonpi te kung pan in mundang ah paipui a, a khutzung te a bil lang le lang sung ah thun in, cilphi a, a lei zong thamsak hi;
Taciang Jesus vandak to in, a tau zawkciang tua pa kung ah, Ephphatha, ci hi, a khiakna sia, ki hong tahen, a cinopna a hihi.
Tasia pociang in a bil te ki hong in, a lei thangui zong ki phel a, a thiang vaset in pau hi.
Jesus in tua thu kuama tung ah son ngawl tu in vaitha hi: ahihang a vaithak tam seseam le nasia va-ial in pualak hi;
Tasiaciang amate in lamdangsa mama uh a, Ama in na theampo a pha in vawt hi: nangong te khua zasak zo a, a pau thei ngawl te zong pausak hi, ci uh hi.
Tua zawkciang a tam mama mihonpi te sia neak tu nei ngawl hi, taciang Jesus in a nungzui te a kung ah sam a,
Mihonpi te hesuakhuai sa khi hi, banghangziam cile amate sia ka kung ah nithum hong om zo a, neak tu bangma nei ngawl hi:
An ne ngawl in amate innlam zuan in ciasak hileng, amate lamkal ah puk-hong tu hi: banghangziam cile pawlkhat te sia a khuala mama na pan in hongpai uh hi, ci hi.
A nungzui te in, hi duisung ah a kua in mihing hi za ngilva tu in vak tu anluum kong pan nga thei tu ziam? ci in zo kik uh hi.
Taciang Jesus in, Anluum bangza nei nu ziam? ci in dong hi. Amate in sali, ci uh hi.
Jesus in mipi te lei ah to tu in thupia hi: taciang anluum sali la a, lungdam a ko zawkciang phel in, mipi te lui tu in a nungzui te mai ah koi a; a nungzui te in mipi te lui hi.
Amate in ngasa tawm nei hi: Jesus in thupha a piak zawkciang in, mipi te lui tu in thupia hi.
Amate ngilvatak in a neak zawk uh ciang in: anluum neng teng thawm uh a bawm sali dim hi.
A ne te sia tul li kiim pha hi: taciang Jesus in amate ciasak hi.
Tuazawk pociang ngunkuang sung ah a nungzui te taw tum a, Dalmanutha ngam huam sung ah pai uh hi.
Pharisee te hongpai in, Jesus thu dok kipan uh hi, Ama ze-et tu in vanlam musakna ngen uh hi.
Jesus in a thinsung tawng pan tau vahum in, Banghang in hi minam te in musakna ngen ziam? a tatak in kong ci ciang, hi minam te kung ah musakna bangma pia ngawl tu khi hi, ci hi.
Taciang Jesus in amate nusia in, ngunkuang sung ah to kik a ngalkhat ah pai hi.
Nungzuite in anluum keng mangil uh a, ngunkuang sung ah anluum khat simngawl a dang bangma nei ngawl uh hi.
Jesus in amate tung ah, Pharisee te le Herod i tol pan kidawm vun, ci in vaitha hi.
Hi thu sia anluum i ken ngawl hang hi, ci in amate kikum uh hi.
Taciang Jesus in a heak ciang in amate tung ah, Anluum na nei ngawl uh hang hi, ci in banghang kikum nu ziam? he ngawl lai in tel thei ngawl lai nu ziam? na thin uh puisak top lai nu ziam?
Mit nei napi, mu ngawl nu ziam? bil nei napi, za ngawl nu ziam? bangma ciamte ngawl nu ziam?
Tul nga te sung ah anluum nga ka phel lai, a val bawm bangza tawm nu ziam? ci hi. Amate in, sawmleni, ci uh hi.
Tul li sung ah sali ka phel lai in, a val bawm bangza tawm nu ziam? ci hi. Amate in, sali, ci uh hi.
Jesus in amate tung ah, Bangbang in hi thu he thei ngawl nu ziam? ci hi.
Jesus Bethsaida ah hongpai a; amate in mittaw khat a kung ah hong paipui uh hi, taciang tua pa tham tu in ngen uh hi.
Jesus in mittaw pa a khut pan in len a, khuapi puasang ah paipui hi; taciang a mitte tung ah cilphi in, a khut nga a, khatpo mu na nei ziam, ci in dong hi.
Mittaw pa in en a, mihing te sia thingkung bang in a vak mu khi hi, ci hi.
Tua zawkciang Jesus in, mittaw pa mit tung ah a khut nga kik a, ensak hi: a mit vak in, mihing te thiangtak in mu hi.
Jesus in a inn ah ciasak a, Khuapi sung ah tum heak in a, kuama zong son heak in, ci hi.
Jesus le a nungzui te pai uh a, Caesarea Philippi khuapi kiim khua te ah pai hi: lamkal ah a nungzui te kung ah, Ngual in keima sia akua hong ci uh ziam? ci in dong hi.
Taciang amate in, tuiphumpa John: pawlkhat te in Elijah; a dang te in kamsang khat papo hong ci hi, ci in zo kik uh hi.
Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Hi kale, note in, kua hi nong ci uh ziam? ci hi. Taciang Peter in, Nangma sia, Christ na hihi, ci in zo hi.
Tasiaciang in, Ama thu sia kuama tung ah son ngawl tu in nungzui te vaitha hi.
Jesus in amate thuhil kipan a, mihing Tapa in tam mama thuak tu hi, upa te, thiampi lian te le thukhamhil te in nial tu hi, that tu uh a, nithum zawkciang thokik tu hi.
Tua thu sia Jesus in a kilangtak in son hi. Taciang Peter in Jesus samtuam in tei hi.
Ahihang Jesus in a nungzui te kihei in a le-et ciang, Satan: nang ka nung ah kiheam in, banghangziam cile Pathian thu sang in, mihing thu kinzaw ni hi, ci in Peter tei hi.
Taciang Jesus in mihon te le a nungzui te Ama kung ah a sap zawkciang in, A kuamapo ka nung hong zui nuam peuma, ama le ama ki nial hen a, ama thinglamte pua in, hong zui tahen.
Banghangziam cile a kuamapo in, ama nuntakna a hung nuam sia in sum tu hi; ahihang a kuamapo in keima le lungdamna thu hang in a nuntakna a sum peuma in, a nuntakna hu zo tu hi.
Banghangziam cile mi khat in hileitung buppi a nei hial zong, a thaa nuntakna a sum le bang phatuam ziam?
Mihing in a thaa nuntakna bang taw theak thei tu ziam?
Tua ahikom a kuamapo in hi seksol suan te mai ah keima le ka thu a maizumpui peuma; a Pa vangletna sung ah a thiangtho vantungmi te taw hongpai ciang in, mihing Tapa in maizumpui kik tu hi, ci hi.
Jesus in amate tung ah, A tatak in kong ci ciang, hi mun ah a om pawlkhat te in, Pathian kumpingam vangletna taw hongpai a mu dong thina tep tha ngawl tu uh hi. ci hi.
Ni luk zawkciang Jesus in, Peter, James le John te mualsang tung ah a tuam in sam a, amate mai ah a meal kikheal hi.
A puan taang a, leitung ah koibang puansawp peuma in zong a thiansak thei ngawl tu za dong in; vuk bang in pak hi.
Elijah le Moses te hong ki lang a: Jesus taw ki paupui uh hi.
Peter in Jesus kung ah, Syapa awng, eite atu in hi mun ah om tu pha hi: buk thum sa tawng; Nangma atu khat, Moses atu khat le Elijah atu khat, ci hi.
Banghangziam cile amate a laulei uh hu in, bang son tu ci zong a he bua uh hi.
Taciang amate meingo in lia a: meingo sung pan in, hisia ka it ka Tapa a hihi, ama thu ni vun, ci aw khat hong nging hi.
Tasia pociang, amate in a kiim a pam a et uh ciang in, Jesus le amate simngawl kuama a mu bua uh hi.
Amate mualtung pan a tuaksuk uh ciang in, Jesus in, mihing Tapa thina pan in thawkik dong, a mu uh thu te kuama a son ngawl natu in vaitha hi.
Amate in tua a son thu te ciamte uh a, thina pan thokik, ci kammal sia bang a cinopna hi tu ziam, ci in khat le khat ki dong uh hi.
Taciang a nungzui te in, banghang in thukhamhil te in Elijah hongpai masa tu hi, ci ziam? ci in dong uh hi.
Jesus in, Elijah hongpai masa takpi tu a, na theampo sia ama in puakhol tu hi; taciang mihing Tapa thu bangbang in atkhol ziam ci le, ama in tam mama thuak tu a, bangma thusimngawl in koi tu hi.
Ahihang keima in hibang in kong ci hi, Elijah hong theng takpi a, ama thu a ki atkholsa ombang in, amate uk bang in vawt uh hi, ci hi.
A nungzui te kung ah hongpai ciang in, thukhamhil te le mihonpi te a kiim ah thu kidong mu hi.
Thakhatthu in, mi theampo in Jesus a mu uh ciang in, lamdangsa uh a, ama sang ah hong tai in, paupui uh hi.
Jesus in thukhamhil te kung ah, Amate taw bang ki dong nu ziam? ci in dong hi.
Mihonpi sung pan khat in, Syapa awng, ka tapa sung ah a pau thei ngawl doai lut a, na kung hong puak khi hi;
Tua a pau thei ngawl doai in a paipui na mun theampo ah, lei ah puksak in, a kam pan cilphuan te pusuak hi, a ha ngoai in, ngawm zong ngawm liang hi: na nungzui te hawlkhiasak tu in ka son hang; amate in hawlkhia zo ngawl hi, ci hi.
Jesus in ama kung ah, Maw upna nei ngawl suan te, note taw bang hun dong hong om tu khi ziam? banghun dong hong khual lai tu khi ziam? ama ka kung ah hong paipui tavun, ci hi.
Amate in Jesus kung ah paipui uh a: Jesus a mu ciang in, thaa in patang pa sia thakhatthu in lei ah puksak in; cilphuan te thasak hi.
Jesus in, Hi bang a hi zawk ngei zo ziam? ci in a pa dong hi. A pa in a no lai pan ma hi zo hi, ci hi.
Taciang ama siatsua tu in, tu le tu mei sung ah ahizong, tui sung ah ahizong, sep tawntung hi: ahihang khatpo na vawt thei le, kote tung ah hesuakna nei in hong hu tan, ci hi.
Jesus in ama kung ah, Na um ngam ziam, a um te atu in na theampo suakthei hi, ci hi.
Tua patang i pa in thakhatthu in, Topa, um khi hi; ka up ngawl na hong hu tan, ci in thitui taw au hi.
Jesus in mihon te tai kawm in hongpai a mu ciang, doai ngilo tung ah, Nang pau thei ngawl le nangong doai, hi sia pa sung pan pusuak tu le tumkik nawn ngawl tu in thu hong pia khi hi, ci in tei hi.
Tua thaa ngilo sia au a, patangno kawngkaw cip bang in a omsak zawkciang, a sung pan pusuak hi: taciang ama sia a thi bang in om a; mi tampi in, thi zo hi, ci uh hi.
Ahihang Jesus in a khut pan len in kaito hi; taciang ama ding to hi.
Jesus innsung ah a tum ciang in, a nungzui te in a, banghang in ko te in hawlkhia thei ngawl khu ziam? ci in a tuam in dong uh hi.
Jesus in amate tung ah, Hi bang te sia thungetna le antan na simngawl, thudang hang in pusuak thei ngawl hi, ci hi.
Amate tua mun pan Galilee ngam kantan in pai uh a; kuama i heak tu dei ngawl hi.
Banghangziam cile a nungzui te hil in, Mihing Tapa sia ngual khut ah ap tu hi, taciang amate in that tu uh a; a ma a ki thalup zawk nithum ni ciang in thokik tu hi, ci hi.
Ahihang amate in a son thu telthiam ngawl uh hi napi, dong ngam tuan ngawl uh hi.
Capernaum khua theng uh a: innsung a tum uh ciang in Jesus in a nungzui te kung ah, Lamkal ah bang thu ki nial nu ziam? ci in dong hi.
Ahihang amate huthe ngawl in om uh hi: banghangziam cile lamkal ah a ki nial uh thu sia, a kua lianbel tu, ci thu ki nial uh hi.
Jesus to suk a, a nungzui sawmleni te sam in, amate tung ah, A kuamapo a masabel nuam le, tua pa sia, a khakbel le mi theampo te naseam hi tu hi, ci hi.
Taciang Jesus in patangno khat la in, amate lai ah koi hi: a toai zawkciang in, amate tung ah,
A kuama po in keima min taw hibang patang te a sang peuma keima hong sang a hihi, taciang a kuamapo keima hong sang peuma in, keima hong sang hi ngawl in, keima hong sawl pa a sang a hihi, ci hi.
John in, Syapa awng, na min taw doai te a hawlkhia khat ka mu uh a, hong zui ngawl hu in: tho khu hi, ci uh hi.
Ahihang Jesus in, Khak heak vun; banghangziam cile keima min taw na lamdang a vawt khat in, kei hong sonsia mameang ngawl tu hi.
Banghangziam cile ei hong langpan ngawl peuma ei sang ah om hi.
A tatak in kong ci ciang, a kuapo a hi zong keima mihing na hi uh hang in, ka min taw tui dawn tu hai khat hong pia peuma, a thaman tan ngawl tu hi.
Khat po in keima hong um patangno te sung pan khat lam a khialsak sia, a ngawng ah an ngoai na suangtum khit in, tuipi thuk na mun ah khiasuk leang ama atu phazaw lai hi.
Na khut in hong khialsak le, at tan in: bangmahun in a mit ngei ngawl tu hell meisung ah khut lang ni taw pai sang in, pumpi kim ngawl in nuntakna sung ah tum tu phazaw hi:
Tua mei sung ah than zong thi ngawl a, mei zong mit ngawl hi.
Taciang na peang in hong khialsak le, at tan in: bangmahun in a mit ngei ngawl tu hell meisung ah khut lang ni taw pai sang in, pumpi kim ngawl in nuntakna sung ah tum tu phazaw hi:
Tua mei sung ah than zong thi ngawl a, mei zong mit ngawl hi.
Taciang na mit in hong khialsak le, khel keak in: bangmahun in a mit ngei ngawl tu hell meisung ah khut lang ni taw pai sang in, pumpi kim ngawl in nuntakna sung ah tum tu phazaw hi:
Tua mei sung ah than zong thi ngawl a, mei zong mit ngawl hi.
Banghangziam cile khatsim khatsim in mei taw hong ki alsak tu hi, taciang biakpiakna theampo zong ci taw ki alsak tu hi.
Cii sia pha hi: ahihang a al na bo a hile, bangbang in al kiksak thei tu nu ziam? Cii bang in al vun a, khat le khat kilem vadiam in om tavun, ci hi.
Jesus tua mun pan ding in, Jordan ngun ngal khat Judah ngam kimkot teng ah pai hi: mipi te a kung ah hong ki kaikhawm kik leleau a; a hil ngei bang in thuhil kik hi.
Pharisee te a kung ah hongpai a, pasal khat in a zi khul tu ngeina a om ziam? ci ze-et in dong uh hi.
Jesus in amate tung ah, Moses in note bang thu hong pia ziam? ci in zo hi.
Taciang amate in, Moses in khul na lai at in, zi khul tu oai hi, ci uh hi.
Jesus in amate tung ah, Moses in na thinpui lei uh hang in hi ngeina a at a hihi.
Ahihang Pathian in a kipatcil bitphuana hun lai in pa le numei vawt hi.
Tua ahikom pasal in a pa le a nu nusia tu a, a zi beal tu hi;
Taciang amate ni sia taksa pumkhat hi tu hi: tua ahikom amate sia ni hi nawn ngawl tu a taksa pumkhat a hi uh hi.
Tua ahikom Pathian in a ngawm sa te mihing in khen heak tahen, ci in zo hi.
Innsung ah a nungzui te in tua thu ma dong kik uh hi.
Jesus in amate tung ah, A kuamapo in a zi khul in, ngualdang a tenpui le palngul mawna vawt a hihi.
Zi in a pasal nusia in, pasal dang a nei kik le, palngul mawna vawt a hihi, ci hi.
Amate in a tate uh a thamsak tu dei in Jesus kung ah paipui uh a: a nungzui te in amate tei hi.
Ahihang Jesus in a mu ciang in, a thin-uk a, amate tung ah, Patangno te ka kung hong paisak tavun, khak heak vun: banghangziam cile Pathian kumpingam sia hibang patang te atu a hihi.
A tatak in kong ci ciang, a kuamapo hibang patangno bang in Pathian kumpingam a sang ngawl peuma, Pathian kumpingam sung ah tum ngawl tu hi, ci hi.
Taciang Jesus in patang te toai a, amate tung ah a khut nga in, thupha pia hi.
Jesus sia lamkal ah a pai laitak in, mi khat hong tai a, khupdin in, Sya pha awng, tawntung nuntakna ka nga thei natu in bang vawt tu khi ziam? ci in dong hi.
Taciang Jesus in ama kung ah, Banghang in, pha, hong ci ni ziam? Pathian khatbek simngawl kuama a pha om ngawl hi.
Thupiak te he ni hi, palngul mawna vawt heak in, tual that heak in, nguta heak in, a man ngawl tettipang heak in, ngual neisa sut heak in, na nu le na pa zakta in, ci hi.
Taciang tua pa in Jesus kung ah, Syapa awng, hite theampo ka no lai pan in zuisiat zo khi hi, ci in zo hi.
Tasiaciang Jesus in ama itna taw en a, Khat bek kisam lai ni hi: pai tan a, na nei theampo zuak siat in, taciang mizawng te pia in, tua hile vantung ah neisa na nei tu hi: taciang hongpai tan a, thinglamte pua in hong zui tan, ci hi.
Tua thu hang in ama khuangai mama a, thinna in paisan hi: banghangziam cile a neisa tam mama hi.
Jesus in a kimkot teng en a, a nungzui te kung ah, Mihau te Pathian kumpingam sung a tum tu uh bangza in haksa ziam! ci hi.
Taciang a nungzui te in Jesus i son thu hang in lungmang mamatek uh hi. Ahihang Jesus in amate tung ah, Ka tate awng, hauna a muang te atu in Pathian kumpingam sung ah tum tu sia bangza in haksa ziam!
Mihau pa sia Pathian kumpingam sung ah a tum tu sang in, phin bilvang sung ah kala-uk tum tu ol zaw hi, ci in zo kik hi.
Amate in lamdangsa mamatek uh a, tabang hithong le, a kua peuma ngupna nga thei tu ziam? ci in amate kikum uh hi.
Taciang Jesus in amate en a, Hi thu sia mihing te atu in suak thei ngawl hi, ahihang Pathian atu in hi ngawl hi: banghangziam cile Pathian atu in na theampo suak thei hi, ci hi.
Tua zawkciang in Peter in, Jesus kung ah, en in, kote ka hi uh le na theampo nusia in kong zui uh hi, ci hi.
Jesus in, A tatak in kong son hi, a kuamapo keima le lungdamna thu hang in a inn le lo a hi zong, a u le a nau a hi zong, a nu le a pa a hi zong, a zi le a ta te a hi zong, a nusia a hile,
Tu hun in inn le lo hi kale, nu te hi kale, u le nau hi kale, tate hi kale, vawtsiatna tatuam taw a se za in sang tu a; hongpai lai tu hun ah tawntung nuntakna sang tu hi.
Ahihang a masabel te nungkhakbel tu a; a nungkhakbel te masabel hi tu hi, ci hi.
Amate Jerusalem pai na lamkal ah hi uh a; Jesus sia amate mai ah pai hi: taciang amate in lamdangsa in, a nung pan zui kawm in lau tek mama uh hi. A nungzui sawmleni te sam a, a tung ah thupiang tu te son kipan hi,
En vun, Jerusalem sang ah i pai hi; mihing Tapa sia thiampi lian te le thukhamhil te kung ah ap tu hi; amate in thi tu in thukhen tu uh a, Gentile te kung ah ap tu uh hi:
Amate in selno tu a, vel in cilphi tu uh hi, taciang that tu uh a: nithum ni ciang in thokik tu hi, ci hi.
Zebedee tapa James le John te Jesus kung ah hongpai uh a, Syapa awng, kong nget tu uh sia nong vawtsak tu ka uk uh hi, ci uh hi.
Jesus in amate tung ah, No atu in bang hong vawatsak tu khi ziam? ci hi.
Amate in, na minthanna sung ah khat na ziatsang ah, a dang khat sia na veisang ah hong tosak tan, ci uh hi.
Hi kamale, Jesus in, Bang ngen nu ziam ci zong he ngawl nu hi: ka dawn tu hai dawn zo tu nu ziam, ka san tu baptisma sang zo tu nu ziam? ci hi.
Amate in, zo tu khu hi, ci uh hi. Jesus in, Ka dawn tu hai dawn takpi tu nu hi, ka san tu baptisma zong sang takpi tu nu hi:
Ahihang ka ziatsang le ka veisang a to tute sia kei i piak tu hi ngawl a; ka Pa in a ngealkholsa te pia tu hi, ci hi.
Tua thu a dang sawm te in a zak uh ciang in, James le John tung ah a lung uh kim ngawl hi.
Ahihang Jesus in amate tung ah, Na heak uh bang ma in Gentile kumpi te in a mihing te sia zawthawk thu taw uk uh a, ulian te in mipi te tung ah thuneina zang tawntung uh hi.
Ahihang no sung ah hibang hi ngawl tu hi: note sung ah khatpo a lian nuam le, note i naseam hi tahen:
Note sung pan khatpo in a lu bel a hi nuam le, note in sila hi tahen.
Mihing Tapa sia ngual a sawl tu in hongpai ngawl hi, ngual atu seam tu in le mi tampi tatkhiat natu a nuntakna pia tu in hongpai hi, ci hi.
Jesus le a nungzui te Jericho ah hongpai uh a: amate mihon tampi taw Jericho pan a pusua uh ciang in, Timaeus i tapa, Bartimaeus a kici mittaw pa sia lamhui ah to in khutdaw ngen hi.
Ama in Nazareth khua mi Jesus hi, ci a zak ciang in, David Tapa Jesus awng, hong hesuak kapo in, ci in au hi.
Mi tampi te in ama a om khikhep natu in tei uh hi kale: Nang David Tapa awng, hong hesuak kapo in, ci in au seseam hi.
Jesus ding a, ama sam tu in thupia hi. Amate in mittaw pa kung ah, thinnuam in a, ding in; Ama in hong sam hi, ci uh hi.
A puantual sil sia khia in, ding a, Jesus kung ah pai hi.
Jesus in ama zo a, Nang tung ah bang ka vawt tu uk ni ziam? ci hi. Mittaw pa in, Topa awng, ka mit khua mu tu uk khi hi, ci hi.
Jesus in ama kung ah, pai in; na upna in hong damsak zo hi, ci hi. Tasia pociang in khuamu a, lampi ah Jesus nungzui hi.
Amate Jerusalem hong nai ciang, Olive mual a om Bethphage le Bethany a thet uh ciang in, Jesus in nungzui te ni sawl in,
Na mai uh ah pai tavun a: khuasung na tum uh pociang kuama to ngei ngawl lai laano a ki khitsa in mu tu nu hi; a khau sut vun a, ka kung ah paipui tavun.
Khat po in banghang hibang ngamta nu ziam? hong ci le, Topa in tulmaw hi; ci vun, tasia pociang hong paisak pai tu hi, ci hi.
Amate pai uh a, lampi kisiktua na mun kongkha hui a puasang ah laano a ki khit mu uh hi; taciang sut uh hi.
Tua mun ah a ding te in, banghang in laano sut nu ziam? ci uh hi.
A nungzui te in Jesus thupiak sa bang in a son uh ciang: amate in paisak uh hi.
Amate in laano sia Jesus kung ah hong paipui uh a, a tung ah puan te pha hi; taciang Jesus a tung ah to hi.
Mi tampi te in lampi ah a puan uh te pha uh a: midang te in zong thingbak te sat in lampi tung ah pha uh hi.
A mai ah a pai te le a nung pan a zuite in, Hosanna; Topa min taw hongpai pa thuphatoai a hihi:
I pa David kumpingam in thupha nga tahen, Topa min taw hongpaipa: a sangbelna ah Hosanna, ci in au uh hi.
Taciang Jerusalem biakinn sung ah tum uh a: na theampo a et zawk, nitaksang ciang in, nungzui sawmleni te taw Bethany khua ah pai tek uh hi.
A zingciang Bethany khua pan amate a paikik uh ciang in, Jesus a ngilkial hi:
A ngalkhat pan in a te puitung mama theikung khat mu a, a nga a om tha le, ci in pai hi: a bul a thet ciang in, a te simngawl bangma mu ngawl hi; banghangziam cile a nga hun hi ngawl hi.
Jesus in tua theikung sia, Kuama in bangmahun in na nga ne nawn heak tahen, ci hi. A nungzui te in zong za uh hi.
Amate Jerusalem ah hongpai uh a: Jesus biakinn sung ah tum hi, biakinn sung ah vanzuak te le a lei te nawtkeak in, sum theak te sabuai te le vakhu zuak te in tokhum te lawnthal siat hi;
Biakinn hui pan zong kuama vanpua kawm in tawnsak nawn ngawl hi.
Jesus in, Ka inn sia minam theampo in thungetna inn, ci tu uh hi, ci atkhol hi ngawl ziam? ahihang note in nguta te kua in na vawt uh hi, ci hil hi.
Tua thu thukhamhil te le thiampi lian te in a zak uh ciang in, Jesus bangbang in that thei tu, ci in zong tek uh hi: banghang in amate in Jesus lau ziam cile, mi theampo in a hilna lamdang asak uh hang a hihi.
Nitak sang ciang in Jesus khuapi sung pan in pusuak hi.
A zingsang ciang lampi ah a pai uh kawm in, amate in theikung sia a sungpan kipan a ko siat mu hi.
Peter in phawkkik a, Jesus kung ah, Syapa awng, en in, na hamsiat theikung sia ko siat zo hi, ci hi.
Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Pathian sung ah upna nei vun.
Banghangziam cile, a mantak in kong ci hi, a kuamapo in, a thinsung ah uplakna nei ngawl in, a pau bang in a vekpi piang tu hi; ci upna taw hi mual tung ah, ki khin in a, tuipi sung ah ki khiasuk in; a ci le a ci bang in piang tu hi.
Tua ahikom kong ci hi, thu na nget uh ciang in, na dei uh theampo sia nga khi hi, ci na um uh le na nga tu uh hi.
Thu na nget tu uh ciang in, khatpo i tung ah diksak ngawl na na nei uh le, maisak vun: tabang in vantung a om na Pa uh zong in na vawtkhial uh te hong maisak tu hi.
Ahihang note in ngual khialna te na maisak bua uh le, vantung a om na Pa uh in note khial na zong hong maisak ngawl tu hi, ci hi.
Amate Jerusalem ah hongpaikik uh a: biakinn sung ah Jesus a pai laitak in, thiampi lian te, thukhamhil te le upa te a kung ah hongpai uh a,
Ama tung ah, bang thuneina taw hibang nate vawt ni ziam? hibang nate vawt tu in a kua in hibang thuneina hong pia ziam? ci uh hi.
Tasiaciang in Jesus in amate tung ah, Kei zong thu khat hong dong tu khi hi, hong zo tavun, hibang te bang thuneina taw vawt khi ziam, ci kong son tu hi, ci zo hi.
John i tuiphumna a piak sia, vantung pan ziam, mihing tung pan ziam? hong zo tavun, ci hi.
Amate kikum uh a, vantung pan ci leang; ama in banghang ama um ngawl nu ziam? hong ci tu hi.
Ahihang, mihing tung pan hi, ci tu hile; amate in mipi te lau hi: banghangziam cile mi theampo in John sia kamsang tatak hi, ci ngaisun tek uh hi.
Taciang amate in Jesus kung ah, hong son thei ngawl khu hi, ci uh hi. Tasiaciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Hibang te bang thuneina taw vawt khi ziam ci keizong kong son bua tu hi, ci in zo hi.
Jesus in thu sontena te zang in amate thuhil pan hi. Mi khat in sapit huan sung ah sapit cing a, a huang um in sapit sukna tu dum zong to hi, taciang teitan zong sa a, huan naseam tu te zawn in ama a khuala mama na ah khualhaw hi.
A hun a cin ciang in, huan naseam te kung pan a nga te la tu in a naseam te khat sawl hi.
Amate in man in vel uh a, khut nguak in tha kik uh hi.
A dang naseam khat sawl kik leleau hi; tua pa sia suangtum taw sep in a lu zong liam hi, taciang maizum huaitak in tha kik uh hi.
Taciang a dang khat sawl kik leleau a; amate in tua pa that uh hi, a dang tampi te zong vel in that uh hi.
Tua ahikom a it mama a tapa khat a neisun sia, amate in ka tapa sia zakta tu uh hi, ci in, a khakbel ciang in paisak hi.
Ahihang lo naseam te in, hisia pa a ngamhlua tu pa hi; pai tavun, ama that tawng, a ngamh teng eima a hi tu hi, ci in kikum uh hi.
Taciang amate in a tapa man in, that uh a, sapit huan puasang ah vawk hi.
Tua ahikom sapit huan nei topa in bangbang vawt tu ziam? ama hongpai tu a huan naseam te siatsua tu hi, taciang sapit huan sia ngualdang te kung ah pia tu hi.
Innsa te in a nil uh suangtum sia innbul thupibel suak hi:
Hi thu in Topa i vawt hi a, i mu na ah, lamdang mama hi, ci in Lai Thiangtho sung ah simngei ngawl lai nu ziam? ci hi.
Amate in, sontena a son te amate a cinopna hi, ci he ahikom in, Jesus sia mat sawm napi: mipi te lau a hi uhkom in Jesus paisan uh a, a kung pan in kiheam siat uh hi.
Amate in Jesus a kampau na pan man tu in, Pharisee te pawlkhat le Herod pawl te sawl uh hi.
Amate hongpai uh ciang in Jesus kung ah, Syapa awng nangma sia thutang ni hi, kuama zong lau ngawl le mihing te maitang zong en ngawl in Pathian thutak lampi hil ni hi, ci kong he uh hi: Caesar kung ah shia piak tu sia ngeina a hi ziam, hi ngawl ziam?
Pia tu khu ziam maw, a hibale pia ngawl tu khu ziam? ci hi. Ahihang Jesus in amate ki hitheamsak he ahikom, Banghang in hong ze-et nu ziam? dangka khat paipui tavun, en tu khi hi, ci hi.
Taciang amate in paipui uh hi. Jesus in, Hi lim le ceptena sia a kua ziam? ci hi. Amate in, Caesar le ceptena hi, ci uh hi.
Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Caesar neisa te Caesar pia vun a, Pathian neisa te Pathian pia vun, ci in zo hi. Taciang amate in Jesus lamdangsa mama uh hi.
Thawkikna om ngawl hi; a ci Sadducee te Jesus kung ah pai in, thu dong uh a,
Syapa awng, mi khat a suapuipa a thi ciang in, a zi ta nei ngawl in a nusia le, a thi pa i cimit ngawl natu in a nau in a mo tenpui hen, ci Moses in hong ci hi.
U nau sali om uh a: a lianbel sia in zi nei napi, ta nei ngawl in thi hi.
A nina pa in tua nu tenpui a, ta nei ngawl ma in thi hi: a thumna zong tabangma hi.
A sali bup in tua nu tenpui uh a, kuama in ta a nei bua uh hi: a khakbel ciang in tua nu zong thi hi.
Tua ahikom thawkikna ni, amate a thawkik uh ciang in, tua nu sia a kua zi hi tu ziam? banghangziam cile a sali bup in tenpui hi, ci uh hi.
Jesus in amate tung ah, Lai thiangtho le Pathian vangletna na heak ngawl uh hang in, khial hi ngawl nu ziam?
Banghangziam cile, amate thina pan a thawkik ciang in, kipui na le nupa tu in ki piak ci bang om nawn ngawl tu a; vantungngam ah vantung mite bang i hi tu hi.
Mithi te thawkik na thu taw kisai in: Moses laibu sung ah, Pathian in lopa phung sung pan Moses a son na ah, Keima sia Abraham Pathian, Isaac Pathian le Jacob Pathian ka hihi, a ci na simngei ngawl nu ziam?
Pathian sia mithi te Pathian hi ngawl a, a nungta te Pathian a hihi: tua ahikom note nasiatak in khial nu hi, ci in zo hi.
Amate in tua thu a kikup uh thukhamhil te sung pan khat in a zak ciang in, Jesus in phatak in zo hi, ci a heak ciang, a kung ah pai a, thupiak theampo sung pan a masabel bang ziam? ci in dong hi.
Jesus in ama kung ah, Thupiak theampo sung pan a masabel sia, ngai vun, Maw Israel; Topa i Pathian bek Topa hi:
Topa na Pathian sia na thinsung theampo, na nuntakna theampo, na ngaisutna theampo le na hatna theampo taw it in: hi sia in a masabel thupiak a hihi.
Taciang a ni na sia, a khatna taw a kibang hi a, nangma le nangma na ki it bang in na innpam it tu ni hi. Hi te sang in a lianzaw thupiak om nawn ngawl hi, ci in zo hi.
Thukhamhil pa in Jesus kung ah, pha hi, Syapa awng, nang thutak son ni hi: banghangziam cile Pathian khatbek om a; Ama simngawl a dang om ngawl hi:
Taciang Ama sia, thinsung theampo le heakna theampo, nuntakna theampo le hatna theampo taw it tu a hihi, taciang ama le ama a ki it bang in a innpam zong a it tu hi, tua thu sia meihal biakpiakna le sangaw biakpiakna theampo sang in thupi zaw hi, ci hi.
Tua pa in pilvangtak in a zo kik Jesus in a mu ciang in, ama tung ah, Nangma sia Pathian kumpingam taw na ki khuala bua hi, ci hi. Tua zawkciang kuama in Jesus thu a dong ngam nawn bua uh hi.
Jesus in, biakinn sung ah thu a hil laitak in, Bangbang in thukhamhil te in Christ sia David Tapa ci thei ziam?
Banghangziam cile David in Tha Thiangtho taw in ama le ama a kici na ah, Topa in ka Topa kung ah, na ngal te na peang ngakna in ka vawt mateng ka ziatsang ah to in, ci hi.
Tua ahikom David in ama le ama sia Topa kici a hile; bangbang in a tapa hi thei tu ziam? ci in zo hi. Mihonpi in lawptak in ngai tek uh hi.
Jesus in a hil na ah, Thukhamhil te kidawm vun, amate sia puantualpui taw vak nuam sap uh a, sumbuk te ah paupui na te,
Sinakok sung ah tokhum tungnung te le poai mun theampo ah a sangbel inn doi te dei uh hi:
Amate in meingong te inn zawthawk thu taw sut uh a, a sau mama thu ki ngensak hi: tua ahikom hi te in a lian zaw dan thuak tu uh hi, ci hi.
Jesus sumpi kuang mai ah to a, ngual in sumpi kuang sung ah bangbang in sumpi khia ziam, ci in en hi: mihau tampi te in tampitak khia uh hi.
Taciang a zawng meingongnu khat hongpai a, a son thamman ngawl dangka tang ni khia hi.
Taciang Jesus in a nungzui te a kung ah sam a, A mantak in kong son hi, hi a zawng meingong nu in sumpi kuang sung ah a khia theampo sang in a tamzaw khia hi:
Banghangziam cile, amate sia a dimlet a nei uh sung pan in khia uh hi; ahihang meingong nu a hile, a kivak natu kisam kawm pan in a nei theampo khia hi,
Jesus biakinn sung pan a pusua ciang in, a nungzui te sung pan khat in, Syapa awng, en in, hi suangtum te bangbang in kiphut le bangbang a kisa innpi te ziam? ci hi.
Jesus in ama kung ah, Hi inn lianpui te na mu ziam? suangtum kithuap khat zong om nawn ngawl in ki lawnthal siat lai tu hi, ci hi.
Jesus biakinn ngalkhat Olive mualtung ah a to laitak in, Peter, James, John le Andrew te in,
Hi thu te banghun ciang in piang tu ziam, hong son tan? ci in a tuam in dong uh hi.
Jesus in amate tung ah, Kuama i hong theam ngawl natu in kidawm vun:
Banghangziam cile ka min taw mi tampi hongpai tu uh a, keima in Christ ka hihi; ci in mi tampi theam tu hi.
Taciang ngal ki do le ngal kisim natu thu te na zak uh ciang in thinngim heak vun: banghangziam cile tabang theampo sia a piang kul hamtang hi a; a tawpna tu hi ngawl lai hi.
Banghangziam cile minam khat le khat kido tu uh a, kumpingam khat le khat ki sim tu hi: mun tatuam ah zinling tu a, kial le haksatna te om tu hi: hi te sia ngimna te i kipatna a hihi.
Hi kamale noma le noma kidawm vun: banghangziam cile amate in hausa zum ah hong ap tu uh hi; taciang synagogue sung ah zong hong vel tu uh a: keima hang in le amate atu tetti hitu in, ngam uk te le kumpi te mai ah hong paipui tu uh hi.
Lungdamna thu sia minam theampo sung ah ki son masa tu hi.
Ahihang amate paipui in hong ap uh ciang, na pau tu uh ngaisun khol heak vun, ngeal zong ngealkhol heak vun: ahizong a hun ciang in hongpiak babang in pau vun: banghangziam cile tua te sia no i pau hi ngawl in, Tha Thiangtho hi.
Unau zong thi tu in ki zuak tu hi, a pa zong in a tapa zuak tu a; tate in a nu le a pa ding in langpan tu uh a, thi na ciangdong ki then tu uh hi.
Mi theampo in Keima min hang in hong ensan tu uh hi: hi kamale a tawp dong in a thuakzo sia, ki ngum tu hi.
Ahihang kamsang Daniel sonkholna bang in a lipkhaphuai sia a kilawm ngawl na mun ah na mu uh ciang in, (a sim te in tel ta uh hen) Judah ngam sung ah a om te mual tung pan in tai tahen:
Innkhum tung a om te inn sung ah van la tu in tuaksuk nawn heak hen:
Lo sung a om te in a puan la tu in cia nawnheak hen.
Ahihang tua ni ciang naupai te le nau noailuai te haksa mama tu uh hi!
Na tai tu uh hun sia phalbi sung a hi ngawl natu in thungen vun.
Banghangziam cile tua hun ciang hong theng tu ngimna sia, Pathian in a kipatcil bitphuana pan kipan tuning dong om ngei ngawl lai a, maisang ah zong om kik nawn ngawl tu hi.
Tua hun le ni te Topa in tomsak ngawl hile, kuama suakta ngawl tu hi: ahihang a tealsa te atu in, tua ni te tomsak hi.
Taciang khatpo in, en vun, Christ ziak ah om hi; a hibale, zesung ah om hi; hong ci le um heak vun:
Banghangziam cile Christ phaw sil te le leilot kamsang te hong theng tu uh a; a hi thei le a tealsa te zong theam tu in musakna le nalamdang tampi lak tu uh hi.
Ahihang kidawm vun: en vun, hi thu te hong sonkhol zo khi hi.
Ahihang haksatna teng zawk, tua hun le ni te sung ah, ni hong mial tu a, tha zong tang ngawl tu hi,
Van ah aksi te zong tak tu a, vantung vangletna te zong ki thing tu hi.
Tua zawkciang in mihing Tapa sia minthang vanglian taw meingo pan hong tuak amate in mu tu uh hi.
Taciang leitung mongkhat pan in van mongkhat dong, leitung kingli pan a tealsa te kaikhawm tu in, Ama vantungmi te sawl tu hi.
Theikung pan in sontena khat sin vun; a bak te pan in a dawnmoi te hong sua ciang khal hong nai zo hi, cina he uh hi:
Tasia bangma in hibang te na mu uh ciang in, a hun hong nai mama zo a, kongbiang kung tatak ma hong theng zo hi, ci he tavun.
A tatak kong ci ciang, hibang te theampo a piansiat mateng, hi suan le pal te bo siat ngawl tu hi.
Van le lei bo tu hi: ahihang ka kammal te a bo bua tu hi.
Ahizong tua ni le hun sia kuama in he ngawl hi, vantungmi te in zong he ngawl hi, Ka Pa bek in he hi.
Kinging khol vun a, ngak in thungen vun: banghangziam cile a hun na he bua uh hi.
Banghangziam cile, mihing Tapa sia, khual khuala mama a haw khat, a inn a om naseam te thuneina pia in, mi theampo amate nasep tek seam tu le kongcing te zong cingsak in a nusia pa taw kibang hi.
Tua ahikom, note ngak nginge vun, banghangziam cile, innteakpa sia nitak sang, a hibale zan laitak, a hibale akkhuan hun, a hibale zingsangkuan, banghun theng tu ci na he bua uh hi:
A hibale thakhatthu hong theng le na mut laitak hong si tu hi.
Ngak nginge vun, ci note kong son bang ma in, mi theampo son khi hi.
Paisanpoai le tolsaw ngawl anluum poai tu, ni ni a kisap ciang in: thiampi lian te le thukhamhil te in Jesus sia bangbang man in that thei tu ci thimtheltak in kikum uh hi.
Ahihang amate in mipi te buaisak ngawl in poai ni ci bua tawng, ci uh hi.
Jesus sia Bethany khua miphak Simon inn ah anne in a om laitak, numei khat a manham mama alabaster sathau namtui thawl khat keng in hongpai a, a palang sutham in, Jesus lutung ah buak hi.
Tua mun ah a om pawlkhat te a thin-uk uh a, banghang in hi sathau namtui sia pakvawt ziam?
Banghangziam cile amate sia dangka zathum sang in a tamzaw taw zuak in, mizawng te pia leang pha hi, ci uh hi. Taciang amate in numei nu langpan in phun uh hi.
Jesus in, Ama thu in omsak po vun; banghang in nawngkaisak nu ziam? ama in ka tung ah na pha vawt hi.
Banghangziam cile mizawng te sia noma taw om tawntung hi, taciang na ukhun uh po in amate tung ah napha vawt thei nu hi: ahihang kei ka hile no kung ah hong om tawntung ngawl khi hi.
Ama in a vawt thei za vawt hi: ka luanghawm vui natu ama in sathau namtui buakkhol hi.
A tatak in ka ci ciang, leitung mun tatuam lungdamna thu ki son na theampo ah hi numei nu i vawt thu zong ama phaw tawntung natu in kison tu hil, ci hi.
Taciang, nungzui sawmleni sung pan khat, Judah Iscariot sia, thiampi lian te kung ah Jesus ap tu in pai hi.
Amate in a zak uh ciang in, lungdam mama uh a, dangka piak tu in kamciam pia hi. Taciang ama in bangbang ap thei tu, ci hunpha zong tawngtung hi.
Paisanpoai tuuno ki ngaw ni, tol saw ngawl anluum poai ni masabel ni in, a nungzui te in Jesus kung ah, paisanpoai na anneak natu mun koisung ah pai in vawtkhol tu dei ni ziam? ci uh hi.
Tasiaciang a nungzui te ni sawl a, Khuapi sung ah pai tavun a, tuibeal taw tui pua khat mu tu nu hi: ama zui vun.
Ama tum na innteakpa kung ah, Syapa in, ka nungzui te taw paisanpoai an ka neak natu mun leangna inndoi koisung ziam? ci vun.
Tua hile ama in inntung doituam zai mama eite atu in, a ki puakholsa in a om hong lak tu hi, ci hi.
A nungzui te pai uh a, khuapi sung a thet uh ciang in, Jesus sonkhol bang in mu uh hi: amate in paisanpoai atu in vawtkholsiat uh hi.
Taciang nitak sang ciang in Jesus a nungzui sawmleni te taw hongpai hi.
Amate to uh a an a neak tek uh laitak in, Jesus in, A tatak kong ci ciang, note sung pan khat, keima taw anne sia in hong leheak tu hi, ci hi.
Tasiaciang amate khuangai mama uh a, khat zawkciang khat in Jesus kung ah, kei ka hi ziam? a dang khat in, kei ka hi ziam? ci tek uh hi.
Jesus in amate tung ah, Sawmleni sung pan khat, keima taw kuangsung ah a sawkkhawm sia hi.
Ama thu a ki atkholsa bang in: mihing Tapa sia pai hamtang tu hi, ahihang mihing Tapa a leheak sia, a mailam bing hi! piang bua zaw le ama atu phazaw hi, ci zo kik hi.
Amate a neak tek uh laitak, Jesus in anluum la a thupha a piak zawkciang in, phel hi, taciang amate pia a, La vun a, ne vun: hisia in ka pumpi hi, ci hi.
Taciang hai zong la a, lungdam a ko zawkciang in, amate pia hi: taciang a vekpi in dawn tek uh hi.
Taciang amate tung ah, Hisia in thuciamthak taw kisai in mi tampi atu a luang ka thisan a hihi.
A mantak ka ci ciang, hibang sapittui thak sia, ka Pa kumpingam sung ah note taw ka dawn kik mateng bangmahun in dawn nawn batu hi, ci hi.
Taciang amate la asak zawk uh ciang in, Olive mualtung sang ah paito uh hi.
Taciang Jesus in amate tung ah, Tuucingpa ka that tu a, tuu te peakkeak siat tu hi, ci a ki atkhol bangma in, tu zan in note theampo in keima hang in na thin uh no mama tu hi.
Ahihang ka thawkik zawkciang in, Galilee ah note mai ah pai tu khi hi, ci hi.
Ahihang Peter in, mi theampo nangma hang in thinkiam siat kale, kei thinkiam ngawl het tu khi hi, ci hi.
Jesus in, A mantak kong ci ciang, tuni, tuzan mama in, ak nivei a khuan ma, thumvei hong nial tu hi hi, ci hi.
Peter in nanma taw thi tu ahizong hong nial ngawl tu khi hi, ci in khotak in ci hi. Tasia bangma in a dangte theampo in zong ci tek uh hi.
Amate sia Gethsemane a kici huan ah theng uh hi: taciang a nungzui te kung ah, Ka thunget lan ziak ah to hi vun, ci hi.
Jesus in, Peter, James le John te paipui a, lamdangsa in thinngim mamatek uh hi.
Taciang amate tung ah, Ka nuntakna sia thi thei tu za dong in nasiatak in khuangai khi hi: hi mun ah om in ngak nginge vun, ci hi.
Taciang a maisang tawm pai lai a, lei ah bok in, a suak thei a hile, hi hun taw a ki peal thei natu in thungen hi.
Taciang, Abba, Pa awng, nang atu in na theampo hi thei hi; hi hai ka kung pan hong laksak tan: ahihang keima deina bang hi ngawl in nangma deina bang hi zaw tahen, ci hi.
Taciang Jesus hongpai a, amate mut laitak mu hi, taciang Peter kung ah, Simon, mu na hi ziam? nai khat sungbeak zong ngak zo ngawl na hi ziam?
Ze-etna sung ah na tum ngawl natu in thungen in ngak vun. Thaa sia uk mama hi kale cilesa sia a thaneam hi, ci hi.
Taciang Jesus paikik a, a nget sa bangma in ngen leleau hi.
Jesus a heakkik ciang in, amate mutthip leleau mu hi, banghangziam cile amate mite te ngit mama hi, amate in bangbang zo kik tu zong he ngawl uh hi.
Thumvei na hongpaikik ciang in, amate tung ah, Tu in mu vun a, tawlnga vun: hisia in pha zo hi, a huncing hi zo hi; en vun, mihing Tapa sia mawnei te khut ah leheak hun theng zo hi.
Tho vun a, pai tawng; en vun, Keima hong leheak pa hong theng zo hi, ci hi.
Tabang a pau laitak, thakhatthu in, nungzui sawmleni sung pan khat, Judas Iscariot sia, thiampi lian te, thukhamhil te le upa te taw hongpai hi.
Jesus a leheak pa in, ka nap sia Ama hi, man vun a; paipui vahiat vun, ci in heaksakna piakhol hi.
Judas hong thet pociang, Jesus kung ah hongpai suak a, Syapa, syapa awng; ci in nam hi.
Taciang amate in Jesus man uh a, paipui uh hi.
Taciang a kiim a ding te khat in namsau dawk in, thiampi sangbel pa naseam pa sat ahikom a bil tawng hi.
Jesus in amate tung ah, Banghang in nguta man tu bang in namsau le moltum taw keima man tu in hongpai nu ziam?
Biakinn sung ah thuhil in nisim note taw om hi napi, hong man ngawl nu hi: ahihang laithiangtho sia tangtung hamtang tu hi, ci in zo kik hi.
Tasiaciang amate a vekpi in Jesus nusia uh a, tai siat uh hi.
Tua mun ah tangval khat, puanneal khat bek sil in Jesus nung zui a, tangval te in ama man ahikom:
A puanneal sia nusia in, amate kung pan a pumnguak in tai keak hi.
Amate in Jesus sia thiampi sangbel pa kung ah paipui uh a: ama taw thiampi lian te, upa te le thukhamhil te kaikhawm tek hi.
Taciang Peter in thiampi sangbel pa leitual dong a khuala na pan zui a: naseam te taw mei oai in to khawm hi.
Thiampi lian le le tangpi upa te theampo in Jesus thalup thei natu in a man ngawl tetti te zong napi; a mu bua uh hi.
A man ngawl tetti tu tam mama hongpai napi, amate tetti pan nate a thu uh ki si ngawl hi.
Pawlkhat te ding in a man ngawl tettipang uh a,
Khut taw a kisa hi biakinn ka pheltham tu a, khuttawsak ngawl a dang biakinn nithum sung sa tu khi hi, a ci za khu hi, ci uh hi.
Ahihang amate tetti pan nate sia a thu uh kisi thei ngawl hi.
Thiampi sangbel pa sia a lai ah ding a, Jesus kung ah, bangma zo kik ngawl tu ni ziam? hi te in bangbang in nang hong langpan in tettipang ziam? ci hi.
Ahihang Jesus huthe ngawl in om a, bangma zong zo kik ngawl hi. Thiampi sangbel pa in, nangma sia Christ a kici, thupha taw a dim Pathian Tapa na hi ziam? ci in dong ki hi.
Jesus in, Hi khi hi: mihing Tapa sia vangletna ziatsang ah to in meingo sung pan hongpai na mu tu uh hi,
Tasiaciang thiampi sangbel pa in a puan eaukeak a, tetti dang bang kul nawn ziam?
Pathian a sonsiat na za zo nu hi: bangbang ngaisun nu ziam? ci hi. Amate theampo in, thi tu kilawm mawna nei hi, ci in mawsiat tek uh hi.
Pawlkhat te in Jesus sia cilphi hi, a mai humsak uh a vel in, a vel sia kamsang bang in pualak in, ci uh hi: naseam te in a khutpheak taw beang uh hi.
Peter sia a nuai sang leitual ah a om laitak in, thiampi sangbel pa naseam te sung pan khat hongpai a:
Tua nu in Peter mei oai a mu ciang in, en a, nangma zong Nazareth mi Jesus taw om nu hi, ci hi.
Ahihang ama in, he ngawl khi hi, bang song ni ziam ci zong he ngawl khi hi, ci in nial hi. Taciang ama a puasang ah pusuak a, akkhuang hi.
Naseam numei nu in mu leleau a, a kung a ding te kung ah, hisia pa zong amate sung ah ki hel hi, ci hi.
Taciang Peter in nial leleau hi. Tuazawk a ngei ngawl in, a kung a ding te in Peter kung ah, nangma sia amate sung ah kihel lalawm ni hi: banghangziam cile nangma sia Galilee mi ni hi, na kampau pan ki he hi, ci leleau hi.
Ahihang Peter in, kiciam in, na son uh sia pa he ngei ngawl khi hi, ci in kiciam hi.
Taciang ak a ni veina khuag hi. Taciang Peter in Jesus i sonkhol, ak nivei a khuan ma thumvei hong nial tu ni hi, a ci thu phawkkik hi. Taciang tua thu a ngaisut ciang in kap hi.
Zingsang ciang in thiampi lian te in upa te, thukhamhil te le thunei te teng taw manlangtak in thu kikupna nei uh hi, taciang Jesus sia lehhen in paipui uh a, Pilate kung ah ap uh hi.
Pilate in, nangma in Judah mite Kumpipa na hi ziam? ci in dong hi. Ama in, Na ci bang in ka hihi, ci in zo hi.
Thiampi lian te in thu tatuam taw Ama mawsiat uh ahihang: bangma zo kik ngawl hi.
Taciang Pilate in, bangma zo kik ngawl tu ni ziam? en in, amate in nangma mawsiat na bangzata tettipang uh ziam, ci dong hi.
Ahihang Jesus in bangma zo kikngawl ahikom; Pilate in lamdangsa mama hi.
Tua poai sung ah amate in thongtak te sung pan, mipi te i dei khat papo suatak uh hi.
Taciang ngaltho a, tualthat pa Barabbas a kici khat om hi, ama sia ngaltho dang te taw thongtak hi.
Mihonpi te in a vawt ngei uh bangma in vawtsak tu dei in, a nging tatak in au kipan uh hi.
Ahihang Pilate in, Judah te Kumpipa ka suatak tu na dei uh ziam? ci in dong hi.
Banghangziam cile ama in Jesus sia thiampi lian te in a el uh man in hong ap hi, ci he nginge hi.
Ahihang thiampi lian te in mihonpi te sia, Barabbas suatak zaw tu in holku uh hi.
Taciang Pilate in amate tung ah, Judah te Kumpipa a kici pa bang law tu khi ziam? ci in dong hi.
Taciang amate in, thinglamte tung ah khai in, ci in au kik uh hi.
Taciang Pilate in amate tung ah, banghang ziam, bang mawna vawt ziam? ci hi. Amate in thinglamte tung ah khai in, ci in au seseam uh hi.
Pilate in mipi te lungkimsak nuam ahikom, Barabbas sia suatak a, Jesus sia a vel zawkciang in, thinglamte tung ah khai tu in ap hi.
Ngalkap te in Jesus sia Pilate inn ah tumpui uh a; ngalkap theampo munkhat ah sam hi.
Taciang amate in Jesus sia puan sannum silsak uh a, ling kipheak lukhu sia a lu ah khusak uh hi.
Tua zawkciang, Judah te Kumpipa! thuphatoai ta in, ci in zatakna pia uh hi.
Amate in phaikung taw a lu pan vel uh hi, cilphi uh a, khupdin in bia uh hi.
Amate in a selno zawk uh ciang in, puan sannum a silsak uh sia sutsak kik uh a, Ama puansil te silsak kik uh hi, taciang thinglamte tung ah khai tu in paipui uh hi.
Alexander le Rufus te i pa, Cyrene ngam mi Simon sia, khuano pan hongpai a, lamkal ah ama a mu uh ciang zawthawk thu taw thinglamte puasak uh hi.
Amate in Jesus sia Golgotha a kici, lu ngu mun ah paipui uh hi.
Amate in myrrh taw a ki hel sapittui pia uh ahihang: Jesus in sang nuam ngawl hi.
Amate in thinglamte tung ah a khai zawk uh ciang in, a puan te khen uh a, mi khatsim in a nga tu uh tek aisan in hawm uh hi.
Tabang in thinglamte tung ah a khai uh sia zingsang nai kua a hihi.
Ama mawsiatna lai tak uh a, judah te kumpipa, ci in a tung ah at uh hi.
Taciang Ama taw nguta ni te sia; a ziatsang ah khat le a veisang ah khat, thinglamte tung ah khai uh hi.
Taciang Ama sia mawnei te taw ki sim khawm hi, ci laithiangtho tangtun na a hihi.
Lampi a tawn peuma in nu nau uh a, lupei in, biakinn phel in, nithum sung a sa kik tu pa,
Nangma le nangma ki hun in a, thinglamte tung pan hong tuaksuk tan, ci uh hi.
Tabangma in thiampi lian te le thukhamhil te in zong, hisia pa sia ngualdang ngum thei a; ama le ama ki ngum thei ngawl hi.
Israel te Kumpipa, Christ sia thinglamte tung pan tu mama in tuaksuk hen a, tabang in ka mu le um tu khu hi, ci in selno uh hi. Taciang Ama taw thinglamte tung a ki khai te in zong selno uh hi.
Sun nai sawmleni pan nitak sang nai thum dong leitung theampo khuazing hi.
Nitak sang nai thum ciang in Jesus a nging tak in, Eloi, Eloi, Lamasabaktani? ci in au hi. A khiakna sia, Ka Pathian, Ka Pathian awng, banghang hong taisan ni ziam? a cinopna a hihi.
Tua mun ah a ding pawlkhat te in a zak uh ciang in, En vun, ama in Elijah sam hi, ci uh hi.
Amate sung pan khat hong tai a, tuihup puan la in sapittui hau sung ah pap suk a, phaikung dawn ah a sawm zawkciang, Jesus dawn tu in pia hi, Koi hi po in; Elijah hongpai in a khiasuk ziam, en hi tawng, ci uh hi.
Jesus a ngingtak in a au zawkciang thi hi.
Taciang biakinn sung ah kidoi na puan sia a lu pan a taw dong ki zensuk a, khen ni ki sua hi.
Taciang, Jesus au in, thi ci amai a ding ngalkap mangpa in a mu ciang in, hisia pa sia Pathian Tapa tatak hi, ci hi.
Numei te in a khuala na pan in ngal-et uh a: amate sung ah Mary Magdalene, James a no le Joses te nu Mary le Salome;
Jesus Galilee ngam a om lai in a nungzui te le a khoi te a hi uh hi; Jesus taw Jerusalem ah a pai khawm numei dang tampi te zong om hi.
Tua ni sia sabbath ni a thet ma, ki ngin ni hi a, nitak sang ciang in,
A zatak huai ngaisutna pia le Pathian kumpingam a ngak Arimathaea khua mi Joseph hongpai a, hangsantak in Pilate kung ah pai hi, taciang Jesus luanghawm ngen hi.
Pilate in Jesus thi zo hi, a ci uh ciang lamdangsa mama hi: ngalkap mangpa sam a, Jesus a thi zawk ngei zom ziam? ci in dong hi.
Ngalkap mangpa kung pan a heak ciang in Jesus luanghawm sia Pilate in Joseph pia hi.
Taciang Joseph in puanneal lei a, Jesus khiasuk in, puanneal taw tuam hi, taciang a ki to tawm suang hawng sung ah vui a, than kongkha ah suangtum lik hi.
Mary Magdalene le Joses nu Mary te in Jesus a vui na mun en uh hi.
Sabbath ni a bo ciang in, Mary Magdalene, James nu Mary le Salome te hongpai uh a, Jesus luanghawm zut tu sathau namtui te keng uh hi.
Nipikal khat sung ni masabel ni zingtung, ni sua ciang in, amate than ah pai uh hi.
Taciang amate in than kongkha a suangtum sia kua in hong liksak tu ziam? ci in kikum kawm uh hi.
Amate in a et uh ciang in, suangtum a ki lik sa in mu uh hi: banghangziam cile tua suangtum sia lian mama hi.
Than sung a tum uh ciang in, tangval khat puanpak tualpui sil in ziatsang ah a to, amate in mu uh a; lau mama uh hi.
Ama in numei te kung ah, lau heak vun: thinglamte tung a ki khai Nazareth khua mi Jesus zong nu hi; Ama thokik zo hi; hi mun ah om nawn ngawl hi: Ama ki vui na hong en tavun.
Ahihang pai tavun a, a nungzui te le Peter kung ah, na mai uh Galilee ah pai hi, ci in son vun: note hong sonkholsa bangma in, tua mun ah mu tu nu hi, ci in son hi.
Taciang amate than pan in manlangtak in pai uh a, tai kawm uh hi; banghangziam cile amate huang liang in lamdangsa mama uh hi: kuama kung ah zong bangma son ngawl hi; banghangziam cile amate a lau uh hang a hihi.
Jesus sia nipikal khat sung ni masabel ni zingtung a thawkik ciang in, a sung pan doai ngilo sali a hawlkhiatsak Mary Magdalene kung ah kilang masabel hi.
Taciang ama pai a, Jesus taw kithawl ngei in, a kap a tau te son hi.
Amate in, Jesus nungta hi, ci le Mary in mu hi, ci a zak uh ciang in, a um bua uh hi.
Tua zawkciang in amate sung pan mi ni, khuano sang a pai te kung ah, Jesus meal lamdang in kilaak hi.
Taciang amate pai in a dang te son a hi uh hang: amate in a um bua uh hi.
Tua zawkciang in, nungzui sawm le khat te anneakna mun ah a to uh laitak, Jesus hong kilang a, amate tei hi, banghangziam cile amate in a thawkik zawk a mu te i son te um ngawl in a thinpui uh hang a hihi.
Jesus in amate tung ah, Note leitung theampo ah pai tavun a, piansak na theampo tung ah lungdamna thu son tavun.
Um in tuiphumna a sang peuma ngupna nga tu hi; ahihang a um ngawl te sia thukhenna thuak tu hi.
A um te sia hibang musakna te in zui tu hi; ka min taw doai te hawlkhia tu uh a; kam thak taw pau tu uh hi;
Ngul te zong man tu uh a; ngu a ne hial uh zong, bangma tat ngawl tu hi; cina te tung ah a khut uh te nga tu uh a, dam tu hi,
Topa in amate thu a son zawkciang in, Ama sia van ah ki la to a, Pathian ziatsang ah to hi.
Amate pai uh a, mun theampo ah thuhil uh hi, Topa sia amate taw naseam a, a thuhil na uh te nalamdang te in zui in kipsak hi. Amen.
Kote sung ah thu piang te sia mitampi in a ban a ban in at zo a, tua thu tangkona te sia ka up bel uh a hihi,
A kipatcil pan in mitmu tetti te le Pathian kamal naseam te i hong son bang in a ki at a hihi;
A masabel pan in thu theampo a cialcing in he ka hikom, na tung ah a ban a ban in hong at leng pha tu hi, ci ngaisun khi hi, a thupibel Theofilas awng,
Nangma hong hil sa thu te a kip a kho thei natu in hong at khi hi.
Judah kumpipa Herod hun lai in, Zacharias a kici thiampi khat om a, ama sia Abijah i thiampi pawl sung ah kihel hi: a zi min sia Elizabeth hi a, Aaron suan a hihi.
Amate ni sia Pathian mai ah mi thutang te hi uh a, thupiak te le biakna ngeina te sia paubang ngawl in a zui te a hi uh hi.
Amate in ta a nei bua uh hi, banghangziam cile Elizabeth sia ciing hi, taciang amate a ni ma in a kum uh zong ham zo hi.
Zecharias sia ama pawl te taw a nasep hun cing a Pathian mai ah thiampi nasep a sep laitak in,
Thiampi te nasep ngeina bang in aisan uh a, Zecharias in Topa biakinn sung a tum ciang in ngimnamtui hal tu nasep nei hi.
Ngimnamtui a hal laitak in mihonpi theampo a puasang ah thungen khawm uh hi.
Topa vantungmi khat a kung ah hong kilang a, ngimnamtui hal na mun biaktau ziatsang ah ding hi.
Zechariah in ama a mu ciang in, patau a, a tung ah launa theng hi.
Ahihang vantungmi in, Zechariah: lau heak in, Pathian in na thungetna hong za zo hi, taciang na zi Elizabeth in tapa hing tu a, a min sia John, phuak tu ni hi, ci hi.
Lungdamna le thinnopna nei tu ni hi; a sua ciang in mi tampi te zong lungdam tu uh hi.
Banghangziam cile ama sia Topa mai ah mi thupi hi tu hi, sapittui ahizong, zu ahizong, dawn ngawl tu hi; a nu ngil sung pan ma in Tha Thiangtho taw kidim tu hi.
Israel mi tampi te zong amate Pathian Topa kung ah heakkiksak tu hi.
Elijah i thaa le vangletna taw Topa mai ah pai tu a, pa te le ta te i thinsung te ahizong, thu ni ngawl te sia mi thuman te i ciimna ah ahizong; Topa atu in mihing te kinging kholsak le ki thoaikholsak tu in heakkiksak tu hi.
Zechariah in vantungmi kung ah, nong son bang in piang takpi tu hi, ci bangbang in he tu khi ziam? banghangziam cile keima sia pasal huai khi hi, taciang ka zi zong huai mama zo hi, ci hi.
Tasiaciang vantungmi in, keima sia Pathian mai ah a ding Gabriel ka hihi; nangma paupui tu le lungdamna thu son tu in hong sawl hi.
Taciang, en in, hi thu te a pian ni dong pau thei ngawl tu ni hi, banghangziam cile amate hun ciang a tangtung tu ka thu na up ngawl hang a hihi, ci in zo hi.
Mipi te in Zechariah ngak uh a, biakinn sung ah ngei mama om ahikom in, lamdangsa uh hi.
Biakinn sung pan a pusua ciang in amate tung ah bangma son thei ngawl hi: taciang biakinn sung ah mangmu hi, ci amate in he uh hi: banghangziam cile a khut taw lak a, pau thei tuan ngawl hi.
Thiampi nasep ni te a bo pociang in Zechariah sia a inn ah cia hi.
Tua zawkciang in a zi Elizabeth sia naupai a, tha nga sung bu hi,
Tua ahikom Elizabeth in, Topa in keima atu in hi thu hong vawtsak hi, mihing te sung ah zawnsakna ka thuak nate hong laksak tu in Ama in hong ve zo hi, ci hi.
Tha luk a cin ciang in, Pathian in vantungmi Gabriel sia Galilee ngam Nazareth khua ah a om,
Ngaknu thiangtho khat, David suan Joseph taw nupa tu in zuthawl piaksa, Mary kung ah paisak hi.
Vantungmi a kung ah hongpai a, na tung ah thupha om tahen, nangma sia a thupi mama maipha nga na hihi, Topa nang taw hong om hi: numei te sung ah thuphatoai na hihi, ci hi.
Ama in vantungmi a mu ciang, a sonthu hang in a thinsung buai a, bangbang paupuina hi tu ziam, ci ngaisun hi.
Taciang vantungmi in, Mary awng, lau heak in, banghangziam cile Pathian mai ah maipha nga zo ni hi, ci hi.
En in, nau na pai tu a, tapa nei tu ni hi, taciang a min sia Jesus phuak tu ni hi, ci hi.
Ama sia mi thupi hi tu a, A sangbel i Tapa, kici tu hi: taciang Topa Pathian in a Pa David i kumpi tokhum pia tu hi:
Ama in Jacob suan te a tawntung in uk tu a; Ama ukna sia tawp hun nei ngawl tu hi.
Mary in vantungmi kung ah, bangbang piang thei tu ziam, keima in pa taw ki he ngei ngawl khi hi, ci hi.
Vantungmi in zo kik a, Tha Thiangtho na tung ah hong theng tu a, A sangbel i vangletna in hong tuam tu hi: tua ahikom na sung pan in a suak tu tapa thiangtho sia Pathian Tapa kici tu hi, ci hi.
En in, na mealheak Elizbeth, a ciing ci in ngual i son ngei sia a kum ham zawkciang in tapa pai hi: tu in tha luk pha zo hi.
Banghangziam cile, Pathian taw a piang thei ngawl bangma om ngawl tu hi.
Mary in, keima sia Topa i sal nu ka hihi; ka tung ah na ci bang in hi tahen, ci hi. Taciang vantungmi a kung pan in paikhia hi.
Tua hun in, Mary ding a, Judah ngam huam mualtung khua ah manlangtak in pai hi;
Zechariah innsung ah tum a, Elizabeth paupui hi.
Taciang, Elizabeth in Mary paupuina a zak ciang in a ngil sung ah nauno tawn hi; taciang Elizabeth sia Tha Thiangtho taw kidim a:
Aw ngingtak taw, nangma sia numei te sung pan thuphatoai na hihi, taciang na ngilsung a om nauno zong thuphatoai a hihi.
Bangbang in ka Topa i nu sia kei kung ah hongpai ziam?
Banghangziam cile, en in, nong paupui na aw ka zak pociang, ka ngil sung ah nauno sia lungdamna taw tawn hi.
A um nu sia thuphatoai a hihi: banghangziam cile tua thu te sia Topa in ama a son bang in vawt tu hi, ci hi.
Mary in, ka nuntakna in Topa lamsang hi,
Keima hong Ngum Pathian tung ah ka thaa a lungdam hi.
Banghangziam cile, nunniam kei a salnu hong ve hi: en vun, tu pan kipan in khangkhat zawk khangkhat, thuphatoai nu, hong kici tu hi.
Banghangziam cile a vanglian Pathian in keima atu in a thupi mama te vawt zo hi; taciang a min thiangtho hi.
A hesuakna sia ama a zakta te tung ah khangkhat zawk khangkhat om tawntung hi.
Ama in a ban taw thahatna hong lak zo a; a ki phasak te thinsung ngaisutna zong ki thethangsak siat zo hi.
Ama in a vanglian te amate tokhum pan in a nuai ah khiasuk zo a, mi nunniam te domto zo hi.
Ama in a ngilkial te thupha te taw ngilvasak zo a; a hau te khut hawm taw ki heamsak hi.
Ama in a hesuakna phawk tawntung in a sal Israel hu zo hi;
I pu i pa te kung ah a sonsa bangma in, Abraham le a suan te hu hi, ci hi.
Taciang Mary sia Elizabeth kung ah tha thum sung om a, ama inn ah ciakik hi.
Elizabeth nau sua tu hun a cin ciang in tapa nei hi.
Elizabeth kung ah Topa hesuakna lianpi kilang ci a innpam te le a mealheak te in a zak uh ciang in lungdampui tek mama uh hi.
Nausen ni liat a cin ciang in vunteap tan tu in hongpai a, a pa min zui in, Zechariah, ci uh hi.
A nu in, hi ngawl hi; a min John kici tu hi, ci in zo hi.
Amate in, na phung sung uh ah hibang min nei kuama om ngawl hi, ci uh hi.
Taciang amate in a pa khut taw lak uh a, bangbang ci nuam ni ziam, ci dong uh hi.
Zechariah in lai at natu ngen a, a min sia John hi, ci at hi. Taciang a vekpi in lamdangsa mama uh hi.
Taciang thatkhatthu in a kam ki hong in a lei hong suakta kik ahikom, pau in Pathian pok hi.
A kim a om theampo tung ah lau na hong theng a; tua thu sia Judah kual mualtung khuano theampo ah ki zel hi.
Tua thu a za theampo in amate thinsung tek ah keam uh a, hisia bangbang nausen hi peuma tu ziam! ci tek uh hi. Taciang Topa khut sia Ama tung ah om hi.
John i pa Zechariah sia Tha Thiangtho taw kidim hi, taciang maisang thu a pualak na ah,
Israel te Topa Pathian minthang tahen; banghangziam cile a mite ve in hun zo hi,
Eite atu in ngupna kii sia a sal David inn sung pan in hong suaksak zo hi;
Leitung kipat lai pan in kamsang thiangtho te kam zang in son zo hi:
I ngal te le hong ensan te khutsung pan in eite ngum tu in ahizong;
I pu i pa te tung ah vawt tu in thu a ciam sa hesuakna le thuciam thiangtho phawk tawntung tu in ahizong;
I pa Abraham tung ah a kiciamna thukham,
Eite tung ah pia tu le i ngal te khutsung pan in hong suaktasak tu a, lau na om ngawl in,
I nuntaksung theampo Ama mai ah thianthona le thutang suana taw Ama na i sep thei natu a hihi.
Taciang nang, nausen, A sangbel i kamsang, hong ci tu hi: banghangziam cile Topa mai ah a lampi puakhol tu in pai tu hi;
A mite tung ah, amate mawna pan in mawmaisak na tungtawn in ngupna thu hesak tu in,
I Pathian i a neam thuthiamna tungtawn in; van pan zing nisuak bang in hong ve zo hi,
Khuazing le thi na lim sung ah a to te khuavak pia tu le eite i peang te thinnopna lampi ah hong makai tu hi, ci hi.
Nausen sia khang a, thaa lam ah thahat hi, Israel te kung ah a kilaak mateng duisung ah om hi.
Tua hun laitak in Caesar Augustus in leitung bup misimna vawt tu in thupia hi.
Hi misimna masabel a vawt ciang in Syrenius sia Syria ngam uk a hihi.
Taciang mi theampo misimna nei tu in amate khua tek ah pai uh hi.
Joseph sia Galilee ngam, Nazareth khua pan in David khua, Judah ngam Bethlehem khua ah pai hi; banghangziam cile ama sia David i suan le minam a hihi:
Misimna nei tu in dokzu a piaksa Mary taw pai uh hi, Mary sia a ngil lian mama zo hi.
Bethlehem ah a om uh laitak in, Mary sia a naunei tu ni hong cing hi.
A tacil tapa hong nei a, puan taw a tun zawkciang, khui ankuang sung ah sial hi, banghangziam cile zintun inn ah amate atu inndoi om nawn ngawl hi.
Tua ngamsung ah tuucing te duisung ah ngiak uh a, zan in a tuuhon te cing in om uh hi.
Taciang, en vun, Topa vantungmi amate kung ah hongpai a, Topa vangletna sia amate kiim teng ah taang hi: taciang amate lau mama uh hi.
Vantungmi in amate tung ah, lau heak vun: banghangziam cile, en vun, note tung ah lungdamna thu hong puak khi hi, tua thu sia mi theampo atu in lungdamna lianpi hi tu hi.
Banghangziam cile tuni in David khuapi sung ah Ngumpa Christ Topa suak zo hi.
Hisia in note atu musakna a hihi; nausen sia puan taw tun a, khui ankuang sung ah a kisial na mu tu uh hi, ci hi.
Thakhatthu in vantungmi taw vantungmi honpi te Pathian pok in,
Van a sangbel na ah Pathian minthang tahen, leitung ah thinnop na om tahen a, mihing te tung ah deisakna pha om tahen, ci hi.
Vantungmi te amate kung pan van ah a heakkik zawkciang in tuucing te in, tu in Bethlehem khua ah pai tawng, Topa i hong heaksak thu en tawng, khat le khat kici uh hi.
Taciang manlangtak in pai uh a, Mary, Joseph le khui ankuang sung ah a kisial nausen mu uh hi.
Tuucing te in ama a mu uh ciang in, vantungmi in hi nausen thu taw kisai amate a son thu te midang te tung ah son uh hi.
Tuucing te i son thu te a za theampo in lamdangsa mama uh hi.
Ahihang Mary in hi thu te theampo sia, a thinsung ah keam in ngaisun hi.
Vantungmi in amate tung ah a son bang in, a zak uh le a mu uh thu te hang in tuucing te in Pathian vangletna le minthanna pok in heakkik uh hi.
Nausen sia vunteap tan tu ni liat a cin ciang, a min sia Jesus ci hi, tua min sia a nu in a ngilsung a pai ma in vantungmi i a phuakholsa min a hihi.
Mary sia Moses thukham bang in thianthona hun a cin ciang in, Topa kung ah ap tu in nausen sia Jerusalem ah paipui hi;
Topa thukham sung ah, sulhong tapa masabel peuma Topa kung ah a thiangtho, kici tu hi; ci in ki at hi.
Topa thukham sung ah a om bangma in, khutun kop khat, a hibale khutheh ni taw biakpiakna piak tu a hihi.
Taciang en vun, Jerusalem ah Simeon a kici pasal khat om hi; ama sia mi pha thutang le biakna sang ah a ki pumpiak hi a, Israel te henepna a ngak khat zong a hihi: ama tung ah Tha Thiangtho om hi.
Topa i Messiah na mu mateng na thi buatu hi, ci in Tha Thiangtho in pualak hi.
Tha ompui na taw in Simeon sia biakinn sung ah hong pai a: thukham ngeina bang in vawtsak tu in nulepa te in nausen Jesus paipui uh hi,
Simeon in nausen a kang ah toai a, Pathian pok kawm in,
