Tabang in vantung ah a kato sia mate in a et tek uh laitak in, en vun, amate hui ah puanpak sil in mi ni hong ding hi;
Tua te in, no Galilee mite, banghang in vantung en in ding top lai nu ziam? note kung pan in van ah a ki lato na mu uh bangma in, hongpai kik tu hi, ci uh hi.
Tua zawkciang in amate Olive mual pan in Jerusalem ah heakkik uh hi, Olive mual sia Jerusalem pan in sabbath ni pai thei na tan khawng khuala hi.
Jerusalem a thet uh ciang in, inn tung doituam ah kato tek uh a, tua mun ah, Peter, James le John, taciang Andrew, Philip le Thomas, Bartholomew le Matthew, Alphaeus tapa James, Simon Zealot, James naupa Judas te om uh hi.
Hiteng a vekpi lungkim in nupi te, Jesus nu Mary le a suapui te taw tatsat ngawl in thungen khawm tek uh hi.
Taciang in Peter sia a nungzui te, mihing za le kul kiim i laizang ah ding a,
U le nau te awng, Tha Thiangtho in David i kam zangin a sonkholsa, Jesus man tute a makai Judas thu taw kisai in hi laithiangtho sia a tangtun hamtang kul hi.
Banghangziam cile ama sia eite taw a kisim khawm hi a, hi Pathian nasepna sung ah panmun nga hi.
Hisia pa in phatngawlna a vawt man taw lo ciing khat lei hi; taciang a lusuk nuailam in tak in, a pumpi kisantham a, a ngil zong ke keak hi.
Hi thu sia Jerusalem ah a om theampo in he uh a; tua lo sia amate kam in, Akeldama, ci uh hi, a khiakna sia, thisan lo, a cinopna a hihi.
Banghangziam cile, Psalm labu sung ah, ama omna mun sia awngthong tahen a, a sung ah kuama om heak tahen: taciang a nasep sia midang in la tahen, ci in ki atkhol hi.
Tua ahikom Topa Jesus eite sung ah sungtum le pusuak in a om hunsung theampo ah,
John in tuiphumna a piakpan kipan, eite kung panvan ah a ki lakto ni dong, eite taw a omkhawm te sung pan khatpo sia thawkikna thu eite taw tetti a hi tu in, nasep piak hamtang tu a hihi, ci hi.
Taciang amate in, Barsabas kici a, Justus zong a kici Joseph le Matthias te ni teal uh hi.
Amate in, Topa awng, nangma in mi theampo i thinsung na he hi, hi te ni sung pan kua na teal ziam, ci hong lak tan,
Tabang in ama in, thunit ngawlna hang in puk a, ama omna mun ah a pai Judas atu in, hi Pathian nasepna le sawltak te sung ah kihel tu hi, ci in thungen khawm uh hi.
Taciang amate in aisan uh a; aitang sia Matthias tung ah tak hi; taciang ama sia sawltak sawm le khat te taw kisim khawm hi.
Pentecost ni hong thet ciang in, amate a vekpi thukimtak in munkhat ah ki kaikhawm uh hi.
Thakhatthu in van pan hui theau vapum bang aw nging hong theng a, amate to na inn hong dim hi.
Taciang leii taw a kibang meikuang hong kilang a, amate khatsim tung ah hong om hi.
Amate a vekpi in Tha Thiangtho taw kidim uh a, Thaa in pau thei na a piak bang in, kam dang tek taw pau uh hi,
Van nuai ngam tatuam pan in biakna sang a ki pumpiak Judah mite Jerusalem ah om uh hi.
Tua aw a zak uh ciang in, mihonpi te hongpai ngawp uh a, amate i pauna sia amate kam tek taw za uh ahikom buai tek mama uh hi.
Taciang amate a vekpi in lungmang in lamdangsatek mama uh a, en vun, amate a vekpi uh in Galilee mite hi ngawl ziam?
Bangbang in i pianpui kam tek taw za hi ziam?
Eite sia Parthia ngam, Media ngam, Elam ngam, Mesopotamia ngam, Judah ngam, Cappadocia ngam, Pontus ngam, Asia ngam,
Phrygia ngam, Pamphylia ngam, Egypt ngam le Libya ngam Syrene khua pan i hi a, Rome sung leangna te, Judah mite le Judah biakna a bia Gentile te,
Cretes le Arabia ngam pan i hi a, amate i eima kam in a pau i zak sia Pathian i a lamdang nasep na hi, ci in khat le khat ki sason uh hi.
Amate a vekpi in lamdangsa mama uh a, lungmang mama in, hi thu sia a bang khiakna peuma ziam? ci in khat le khat ki dong uh hi.
A dang te in selno in, hite sia sapittui thak kham hon uh, ci uh hi.
Ahihang Peter sia a dang sawm le khat te taw ding uh a, aw ngingtak in amate tung ah, no Judah mite le Jerusalem ah a omte, hi thu he tavun a, ka pau te ngai vun:
Banghangziam cile hite sia no i ngaisut bang in kham ngawl hi, zingsang nai kua hi pheang hi.
Ahihnag hi thu sia kamsang Joel i sonkholsa;
Pathian in ni tawpkhak ni ciang in, mi theampo tung ah ka Thaa ka buak tu hi: taciang na tapa te le na tanu te in maisang thu pualak tu uh hi, taciang na tangval te in mangmu tu uh hi, taciang na puhuai te uh in mangman tu uh hi:
Tua ni ciang in, ka salpa le salnu te tung ah ka Thaa ka buak tu a; amate in mailam thu pualak tu hi:
Taciang vantung ah nalamdang te ahizong, lei nuai ah thisan, mei le meikhu musakna te ahizong, ka lak tu hi:
A thupi le a cepte tak Topa ni hong thet ma in, ni hong mial tu a, tha zong thisan suak tu hi:
Tua hun ciang in a kuamapo Topa min a sam theampo in ngupna nga tu hi.
No Israel mite, hi thu te ngai vun; Nazareth mi Jesus sia, Pathian in note sung ah a tumdang nate, nalamdang te le musakna te taw tettipang in a kipsak mihing a hihi, note mama in zong na heak uh bangma in:
Ama sia, Pathian i khensat sa ngaisutna le heakkholsa bang in ki ap hi, taciang note in na man uh a, a seksol khut taw thinglamte tung ah khai in na that uh hi:
Ama sia thina in a letcip tu suakthei ngawl ahikom, Pathian in thokiksak a, thina ngimthuak na pan in suaktasak hi.
Banghangziam cile David in Ama taw kisai in a son na ah, Topa sia a tawntung in ka mai ah ka mukhol hi, banghangziam cile Ama sia ka ziatsang ah om a, bangma in hong linglawngsak zo batu hi:
Tua ahikom ka thinsung ah nopna om a, ka lei a lungdam hi; tuabek dom ngawl ka taksa zong lametna sung ah tawlnga tu hi:
Banghangziam cile nangma in ka tha sia hell sung ah na nusia bua hi, na Mi Thiangtho sia a muatcip tu na oai bua hi.
Nangma in nuntakna lampi te nong hesak zo a; na maitang taw lungdamna dim in nong vawt tu hi, ci hi.
Ka suapui te awng, minam te i pa David thu hangsan tak in kong son tu hi, ama sia thi a kivui zo hi, taciang tuni dong eite taw a than om nginge hi.
Ama in cilesa lam a suanlepal te sung pan, Pathian in Christ sia thokiksak tu a, kumpi tokhum tung ah tosak tu hi, ci in kiciamna taw a kamciam na sia kamsang a hi nataw in he hi;
Hi Christ thawkikna a mukhol hu in, a tha sia hell ah nusia ngawl hi, a taksa zong muat ngawl hi, ci son hi.
Hi Jesus sia Pathian in thokiksak zo a, kote sia a tetti te ka hi uh hi.
Tua ahikom Pathian i ziatsang ah ki lamsang a, Pa i kamciam Tha Thiangtho a san hu in, tu in na mu uh le na zak uh te sia Ama i hong buak a hihi.
Banghangziam cile David sia van ah kato ngawl hi: ahihang ama vateak in, Topa in ka Topa kung ah, ka ziatsang ah to in,
Na ngalte ka peang koina in ka vawt mateng, ci hi.
Tua ahikom Israel minam theampo in thiangtak in tel tavun, thinglamte tung ah na khai uh Jesus sia Pathian in Topa le Christ in vawt zo hi.
Tu in amate in hi thu a zak uh ciang in, amate i thinsung hol a, Peter le adang sawltak te kung ah, U le nau te awng, banglaw tu khu ziam? ci uh hi.
Taciang in Peter in amate tung ah, na mawna uh kisik vun a, na mawna uh hang in na vekpi Jesus Christ min taw tui ki phum vun, taciang Tha Thiangtho letsong na nga tu uh hi.
Banghangziam cile kamciam sia noma, na tate, taciang a khuala mi theampo le Topa i Pathian in a sap tu theampo atu hi, ci hi.
Peter in a dang kammal tampi taw tettipang in hanthawn a, hi minam seksol te kung pan in noma le noma ki ngum vun, ci hi.
Tua zawkciang in Peter thuhilna sia lungdamtak in a sang te tui ki phum uh hi: taciang tua ni ma in mihing tul thum kiim amate kung ah ki belap hi.
Amate sia sawltak te hilna le ki pawlkhopna, anluum bal na le thungetna ah tatsat ngawl in kiptak in om uh hi.
Sawltak te in nalamdang tampi le musakna tampi vawt uh a, mi theampo tung ah launa hong theng hi.
Taciang a um te theampo ki kaikhawm uh a, a neisa theampo zong neikhawm uh hi;
Amate neisa le van te zuak uh a, mi khatsim i a kisapna bang in, mi theampo tung ah hawm uh hi.
Amate sia nisim tatsat ngawl in biakinn sung ah thukim in om tek uh hi, taciang inn khat zawk inn khat ah anluum te bal uh a, lungdamtak le thin ki si lung kisi in an ne khawm tek uh hi.
Pathian pok khawm tek uh a, mi theampo taw maipha nga uh hi. Ngupna nga mi Topa in nisim in pawlpi sung ah belap hi.
Tu in Peter le John sia thunget hun nitak sang nai thum ciang in biakinn ah pai uh hi.
A nu ngil sung pan ma in a peangbai khat sia midang te in toai a, biakinn sung a tum te tung pan huna ngen tu in, Hoi, a kici biakinn kongpi ah nisim in koi uh hi.
Ama in Peter le John te biakinn sung a tum tu a mu ciang in huna ngen hi.
Taciang Peter in, John taw phatak in en a, hong en tan, ci hi.
Amate tung pan in khatpo nga tu lamen in phatak in en hi.
Peter in, dangka le kham bangma nei ngawl khi hi; ahihang ka neisun kong pia hi: Nazareth mi Jesus Christ min taw ding in a, lampai in, ci hi.
Taciang Peter in tua pa ziatsang khut pan len a, kaito hi: tasia pociang tua pa i peang le a ngumit te thakho kik hi.
Ama sia tawnkawm in ding hi, taciang lampai a, biakinn sung ah amate taw tum hi, taciang lampai kawm tawnkawm in Pathian pok hi.
Taciang lampai in Pathian a pok mi theampo in mu uh hi:
Ama sia biakinn ah, Hoi, a kici kongpi ah to in hu na a ngen pa hi, ci a he uh hi: taciang hisia pa tung ah thupiang te lamdangsa in lungman na taw dim uh hi.
A peangbai na pan a dam pa in Peter le John te beal a, mi theampo in lamdangsa in amate kung, Solomon buk sang ah tai lialua uh hi.
Tua thu Peter in a mu ciang in amate tung ah, no Israel mite awng, banghang in hi thu lamdangsa nu ziam? a hibale banghang in hisia pa sia koma vang le thianthona hang in lampai bang in, hong en cinten nu ziam?
Abraham, Isaac le Jacob te Pathian, i pu le pa te Pathian in, a Tapa Jesus sia vangliansak zo hi; Ama na ap uh a, Pilate in thakik nuam napi, note in Pilate mai ah na nial uh hi.
Note in Mi Thiangtho le Mi Thutang pa na nial uh a, tualthat pa note tung ah piak tu in na dei uh hi;
Taciang nuntakna Topa na that uh hi, Ama sia Pathian in thina pan in thokiksak a; kote sia a tetti te ka hi uh hi.
Jesus min upna tungtawn in hisia pa na mu uh le na heak uh bang in, Ama min taw hatsak hi: hi hi, a upna hang in hi damna kicing sia note theampo mai ah pia hi.
Tu in ka suapui te awng, noma le na makai te in Jesus tung ah na vawt uh te, na heak ngawl uh hu in a vawt na hi uh hi, ci ka he hi.
Ahihang tua thu te sia, Pathian in kamsang te kam tungtawn in hong lakkholsa, Christ sia thuak tu hi, ci thu a tangtun natu a hihi.
Tua ahikom note na mawna uh ki sikkik vun a, na thinsung uh ki kheal vun, tabang in na mawna uh te hong phiatsak tu a, Topa mai pan in tha thak na nga uh hun hong thengkik tu hi.
Taciang note tung ah a ki pualaksa Jesus Christ hongpaisak tu hi:
Leitung pian pan kipan Pathian in Ama kamsang thiangtho te kam tungtawn in a sonkholsa bang in, na theampo thaksua na hun dong Jesus Christ sia vantung ah om suak tu hi.
Banghangziam cile Moses in a tatak in, pu le pa te tung ah, Topa na Pathian in keima bang kamsang khat, na suapui te sung pan ka piangsak tu a; note tung ah a sonsa theampo sia na theampo sung ah na ngai tu uh hi.
Taciang in kamsang thu a ngai nuam ngawl peuma, mipi sung pan in susia tu hi, ci hi.
Samuel pan kipan in a nungsang pan kamsang thu a son te theampo in, hi ni te thu sonkhol zo uh hi.
Note sia kamsang te i tate na hi uh hi, Pathian in i pu le pa te taw Abraham kung ah a vawt kamciam, na suanlepal tungtawn in leitung minam theampo in thupha sang tu hi, ci thu na sang tu uh hi.
Note sung ah phat ngawlna pan in, a heakkik peuma thupha pia tu in, Pathian in a Tapa Jesus sia thokiksak a, a masabel in note kung ah hong sawl hi, ci hi.
Amate in mipi tung ah thu a hil uh laitak in, thiampi te, biakinn lampui te le Sadducee te amate kung ah hongpai uh hi,
Sawltak te in mipi te thuhil a, Jesus tungtawn in thina pan thawkikna thu a pualak uh hu in, amate thinna in om tek uh hi.
Taciang amate in sawltak te man uh a, a zingciang dong thongtaksak uh hi: banghangziam cile tu in khua niam zo hi.
Ahihang a thuhilna a za te in um uh hi; a umte a mimal in tul nga kiim pha uh hi.
A zingciang in amate i lampui te, upa te le thukhamhil te,
Taciang thiampi sang Annas le Caiaphas, John le Alexander, taciang thiampi sang i mealheak te theampo taw Jerusalem ah ki kaikhawm tek uh hi.
Amate a laizang ah dingsak uh a, bang thuneina, a hibale akua min taw in hibang te vawt nu ziam? ci dong hi.
Tua zawkciang in Peter sia Thaa Thiangtho taw kidim a, amate tung ah, no mipi lampui te le Israel upa te,
Tuni in hi cina pa tung ah napha vawtsak na le banghang in dam, ci thu taw kisai in thu hong dong nahi uh le;
No teng theampo le Israel mi theampo in he tavun, thinglamte tung ah na khai uh a, Pathian in thina pan a thawkiksak Nazareth mi Jesus Christ min taw, note mai ah a ding pa sia dam hi.
Noma inn sate in na nil uh hi suangtum sia inn khuampi suak hi.
Ngupna sia mundang ah om ngawl hi; banghangziam cile ngupna i nga thei natu in vantung leinuai ah mindang a kipia om ngawl hi, ci hi.
Amate in Peter le John te hangsanna a mu uh ciang in, lai he ngawl le pilna nei ngawl te, ci he uh a, lamdangsa mama uh hi; taciang amate sia Jesus taw omkhawm ngei hi, ci zong he kik uh hi.
Taciang a damsak pa sia amate taw a dingkhawm nginge a mu uh hu in, tua thu langpan in bangma zong a pau thei bua uh hi.
Amate a thuhil na mun pan pusuak tu thu a piak zawk uh ciang in amate bek thu kikum khawm uh a,
Hite sia banglaw tu hi ziam? banghangziam cile amate in a cepte tak nalamdang te vawt uh a, Jerusalem ah a om mi theampo mai ah vawt uh hi; taciang hi thu sia i nial thei bua hi.
Ahihang hi thu sia mite sung ah kizel seseam ngawl tu in ahizong, kuama tung ah hi min taw thuhil ngawl tu ahizong, nasiatak in lauthawn tawng, ci uh hi.
Taciang amate sam uh a, Jesus min taw thuhil ngawlhet tu le son nawn ngawl tu in thupia uh hi.
Ahihang Peter le John in, Pathian thu sang in note i thu man tu sia Pathian mai ah a pha le a pha ngawl noma in khensat vun.
Banghangziam cile ka mu uh thu le ka zak uh thu te son ngawl in ka om thei bua uh hi, ci in zo uh hi.
Tua ahikom amate in a lauthot zawk uh ciang in, bangbang in danpia tu ci a heak ngawl uh hu in suatak uh hi, banghangziam cile mi theampo in hi a sep uh te hang in Pathian minthang pok tek uh hi.
Banghangziam cile damna nalamdang a tung ah kilangpa sia kum sawm li val zo hi.
A suatak zawk uh ciang, amate sia a lawmte kung ah pai uh a, thiampi lian te le upa te in amate tung ah a son theampo sonkik uh hi.
Tua thu amate in a zak uh ciang in, thinkhat lung khat in Pathian kung ah au tek uh a, Topa awng, Nangma sia van le lei, tuipi le a sung om theampo a vawt Pathian na hihi:
Na naseam David tungtawn a son thu, banghang in Gentile mite thin-uk ziam, taciang mihing te banghang in matlap ngawl thu te ngaisun uh ziam?
Leitung kumpi te ding uh a, taciang ngam uk te zong ki kaikhawm in Topa le Christ langpan uh hi.
Banghangziam cile sathau na buaksa Nangma i a thiangtho nauno Jesus sia Herod le Pontius Pilate, Gentile mite le Israel mite taw, ki kaikhawm tek in, nasiatak in langpan uh hi,
Banghangziam cile na khut taw na vawt tu te le na khensatsa ngaisutna te na khuangkhim natu a hihi.
Tu in Topa awng, amate i hong lauthot nate en in: na sal te tung ah na thuhil tu in hangsanna hongpia tan,
Na nauno thiangtho Jesus min taw cina te damsak tu le musakna te le nalamdang te vawt tu in na ban hong phal ta in, ci in thungen khawm uh hi.
Amate thu a nget zawk uh ciang in, a kikhopna mun ling hi; taciang amate sia Tha Thiangtho taw kidim uh a, Pathian thu hangsantak in son uh hi.
Taciang thu um mihonpi te sia thinkhat lungkhat taw in omkhawm tek uh hi: kuama in a neisa te uh keima a hi, ci ngawl uh hi; ahihang amate neisa na theampo neikhawm tek uh hi.
Topa Jesus thawkikna thu sia sawltak te in vangletna lianpi taw tettipang uh a: amate tung ah hesuakna lianpi om hi.
Amate sung ah a ki tangsam khat zong a om bua uh hi: banghangziam cile lo ngam te, a hibale inn nei te in zuak uh hi, taciang a sum nga uh teng keng uh a,
Sawltak te peang ah koi tek uh hi: taciang khatsim i kisapna bang in hawm uh hi.
Taciang Joses, sawltak te in Barnabas a ci uh, Barnabas i a khiakna sia, henepna tapa a kici pa, ama sia Levi minam hi a, Cyprus ngam mi a hihi,
Tua pa in a lo zuak a, a dangka keng in, sawltak te peang ah koi hi.
Ahihang Ananias kici mi khat om a, a zi Sapphira taw a neisa uh zuak hi,
Taciang a zi i heakpui nataw a man pawlkhat khe uh a, pawlkhat hong paipui in, sawltak te peang ah koi hi.
Ahihang Peter in, Ananias awng, banghang in Tha Thiangtho theam tu in le lo man pawlkhat khe tu in Satan in na thinsung hong dimsak ziam?
Lo a om lai in, nangma a hi ngawl ziam? taciang na zuak zawkciang zong, nangma thu ma hi ngawl ziam? banghang in na thinsung ah hibang ngaisun ni ziam? mihing theam hi ngawl in, Pathian theam hi zaw ni hi, ci hi.
Taciang Ananias in hi kammal te a zak ciang puk in, thi hi: hithu te a za theampo tung ah launa lianpi hong theng hi.
Taciang tangval te ding in, tuam hi, taciang puasang ah zawng in, vui uh hi.
Nai thum bang kihal zawkciang in, bang thu piang ci zong he ngawl pi in a zi hong tum hi.
Taciang Peter in a kung ah, na lo uh hi za taw zuak nu ziam? hong son tan, ci dong hi. Taciang ama in, hi za ma hi, ci hi.
Tua zawkciang in Peter in ama kung ah, bangbang in Topa Thaa ze-et tu in thukim thei nu ziam? en in, na pasal vui te i peang sia kongkha bul ah om hi, taciang amate in puasang ah hong zawng tu uh hi, ci hi.
Tua zawkpo ciang in Peter peang ah puksuk in, thi hi: taciang tangval te hong tum uh a, a thisa in mu uh hi, taciang, puasang ah zawng uh a, a pasal kung ah vui uh hi.
Taciang pawlpi le hi thu a za theampo tung ah launa lianpi hong theng hi.
Sawltakte i khut tungtawn in musakna le nalamdang tampi mite sung ah vawt uh a; thu um te theampo Solomon buk sung ah ki thukim tak in omtek uh hi.
Amate sia ngual in pok mama napi, a dang kuama in ki pawlpui ngawl hi.
Taciang thu um mi numei le pasal mihonpi sia Topa tung ah tam seseam ki belap hi.
Tua ahikom cina te sia lamdung ah hong paipui uh a, Peter in a kantan laitak in, a lim in pawlkhat te lia tu in lupna le luppha te taw sial uh hi.
Jerusalem kimkot khua tampi pan in mihonpi te zong hongpai uh a, cina te le doai te i zawthawk te zong hong paipui uh hi: taciang amate a vekpi in dam siat hi.
Tua zawkciang in thiampi sang le ama taw a om Sadducee te theampo thin-ukna taw dim in hong ding uh a,
Sawltak te man in, thong sung ah khia uh hi.
Ahihang Topa vantungmi in zan ciang in thonginn kongkha te hong a, pusua siat hi,
Taciang, pai vun a, ding in biakinn sung mipi te tung ah hi nuntakna thu theampo son tavun, ci hi.
Amate in hi thu a zak uh ciang in, zingtung in biakinn sung ah tum uh a, thuhil uh hi. Ahihang thiampi sang le a naseam te hongpai uh a, Sanhedrin te le Israel upa te theampo sam hi, taciang amate in ngual sawl in sawltak te paipuisak hi.
Ahihang palik te a thet ciang in, thong sung ah a mu ngawl uh ciang, heakkik in son uh a,
Thonginn sia phatak in a kikhak in mu khu hi, taciang thongcing te zong a puasang kongkha mai ah ding nginge hi: ahihang ka hon uh ciang in, a sung ah mihing khat zong ka mu bua uh hi, ci uh hi.
Hi thu te thiampi sang, biakinn lampui te le thiampi lian te in a zak uh ciang in, bang thu hithong ziam, ci in lungmang mama uh hi.
Tasia ciang in mi khat hongpai a, en vun, thong sung na khum mihing te biakinn sung ah ding in mite thuhil san uh hi, ci son hi.
Tua zawkciang in biakinn lampui le palik te pai uh a, amate sia zawthawk thu taw paipui ngawl hi: banghangziam cile mite in suangtum taw a den tu a lau uh hang a hihi.
Amate in sawltak te paipui uh a, Sanhedrin te mai ah dingsak uh hi: taciang thiampi sang in amate thu dong a,
Hi min taw thuhil ngawl tu in nasiatak in thu hongpia zo hi ngawl khu ziam? taciang, en vun, Jerusalem sia note i hilna taw kidimsak siat zo nu hi, taciang hisia pa thisan sia kote tung ah hong thengsak nuam nu hi, ci uh hi.
Taciang Peter le a dang sawltak te in zo kik uh a, mihing te thu sang in Pathian thu ka zui zaw tu uh hi.
Note in thing tung ah that in, na khai uh Jesus sia ka pu le pa te i Pathian in thokiksak hi.
Israel te maw kisikik na le maw maisakna pia tu in Ama sia Pathian in a ziatsang khut taw To le Ngumpa in lamsang zo hi.
Taciang kote sia hi thu te i tetti te ka hi uh hi; taciang Pathian in a thu a zui te tung ah a piak Tha Thiangtho zong tetti a hihi, ci uh hi.
Amate in tua thu a zak uh ciang in, nasiatak in a thin uh uk a, sawltak te that tu in ngaisun uh hi.
Tua zawkciang in Sanhedrin te sung pan Pharisee khat, Gamaliel a kici, thukham taw kisai doctor a hi, mi theampo sung ah a ki zakta pa in, sawltak te tawmvei sung pusuaksak tu in thupia a;
Amate tung ah, no Israel mite, hi thu taw kisai in na vawt tu uh thu kidawm vun.
Banghangziam cile hi te ni om ma in Theudas a kici khat piang ngei a, ama le ama sia mi thupi khat bang in ki suangtak mama hi; mihing zali kiim in beal phot napi, ama ki that hi; taciang a thu zuite theampo ki thethang siat a, bokik siat hi.
Hisia pa om ma in Galilee mi, Judas kici misim laitak in hong piang leleau a, a nungzui mi tamma kaizawn hi: ama zong bokik veve a; a thuzui te theampo a vekpi in, ki thethang leleau hi.
Taciang tu in kong son hi, hi te pial vun a, amate om in om lel tahen: banghangziam cile hi ngaisutna, a hibale, hi nasep sia mihing tung pan ahile, bokik siat lel tu hi:
Ahihang, hisia sia Pathian kung pan ahile, na zozo batu uh hi; Pathian langpan in a do zong na suak thei zawsap tu uh hi, ci hi.
Amate in Gamaliel i son thu sia lungkim tek uh hi: taciang sawltak te sam uh a, a vel zawkciang in, Jesus min taw thuhil nawn ngawl tu in thupia a, suatak uh hi.
Taciang sawltak te sia Jesus min hang in maizumna thuaktak in a cepte hu in angtang mama in Sanhedrin te mai pan pusuak uh hi.
Taciang nisim in biakinn sung le inn tatuam ah tatsat ngawl in Jesus Christ thuhil in pualak tek uh hi.
Tua hun sung, nungzui te hong khan ciang in, Greek te in Hebrew te langpan in kamtam na hong piang hi, banghangziam cile Greek meingong te sia nisim an a hawm uh ciang in ki ngaingonsak hi.
Tua zawkcing in sawltak sawm le ni te in nungzui mihonpi te amate kung ah sam a, kote Pathian thu nusia in an ka hawm tu uh sia lungkim huai ngawl hi.
Tua ahikom, suapui te awng, noma sung pan in a belcing minpha, Tha Thiangtho le ciimna taw a kidim mi sali hong zong tavun a, hi nasep sia amate i ap tu hi.
Ahihang kote sia thungen le Pathian thu sung ah a tawntung in ka kipumpiak tu uh hi, ci uh hi.
Taciang amate sonbang in mihonpi theampo lungkim uh a: amate in, upna le Tha Thiangtho taw a kidim Stephen, Philip, Prochorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas le Antioch khua mi Judah biakna ah a tum Nicolas te teal uh hi.
Amate sia sawltak te mai ah dingsak uh a, thu a ngetsak uh ciang in, amate lutung ah a khut nga uh hi.
Taciang Pathian thu hong khang a; Jerusalem ah nungzui te nasiatak in hong ki belap hi; taciang thiampi tampi te in upna thu zui uh hi.
Taciang upna le vangletna taw a kidim Stephen in, mite sung ah a lian mama nalamdang le lim tumdang lianpi te vawt hi.
Tua zawkciang in A Suaktate synagogue a kici, synagogue sung ah Cyrene mite, Alexandria mite, Cilicia mite le Asia mite sia Stephen taw thu kinial uh hi.
Amate in Stephen i ciimna le thaa taw a pauna te a nalh zo bua uh hi.
Tua zawkciang in amate in mite sia sumnguk pia ku uh a, tua te in, hisia pa in Moses le Pathian langpan in mindaisak na kammal te a pau sia kote in ka za uh hi, ci uh hi.
Taciang amate in mihonpi te, upa te le thukhamhil te hol uh a, Stephen kung ah hongpai uh hi, taciang Sanhedrin te kung ah paipui uh a,
Hisia pa in mun thiangtho le thukham langpan in mindaisak na kammal te tatsat ngawl in pau hi, tabang in leilot tetti tampi koi uh hi.
Banghangziam cile, Nazareth mi Jesus in hi mun sia susia tu a, Moses i hongpiak thukham te lai tu hi, ci in hisia pa in a son ka za uh hi, ci uh hi.
Sanhedrin te thukhen na mun ah a to theampo in, Stephen sia phatak in sal uh a, a maitang sia vantungmi te maitang bang in mu uh hi.
Tua zawkciang in thiampi sang in, hi thu te tabangma ziam? ci hi.
Taciang Stephen in, suapui te le pa te awng, ngai vun; i pa Abraham sia Haran ah a om ma, Mesopotamia ah a omlai tak in, a vanglian Pathian sia ama tung ah kilang a,
Ama tung ah, na ngam le na mipui te sung pan in pusuak in a, kong lak tu ngam ah pai in, ci hi.
Tua zawkciang in Chaldaeans ngam pan pusuak a, Haran khua ah om hi: tua mun pan a pa a thi ciang in, tu in na omna uh mun, hi ngamsung ah ki khin hi.
Taciang hi ngam sung ah a peang ngak natu na ngawn, mun pia ngawl hi: ahihang ama le a suan le pal te sia hi ngam pia tu in ta a nei ma in, kamciam pia zo hi.
Taciang Pathian in hi bang in son hi, a suan le pal te sia ngamdang ah peam tu uh a; kum zali sung sal tang in ngimna thuak tu uh hi.
Taciang a saltanna mun minam te keima in thu ka khen tu hi, tua zawkciang in amate pusuak tu uh a, hi mun ah keima na seam tu uh hi, ci in Pathian in ci hi.
Taciang Pathian in Abraham sia vunteap tanna kamciam pia hi: taciang Abraham in Isaac nei a, ni liat ni ciang in a vunteap tansak hi; taciang Isaac in Jacob nei a; taciang Jacob in minam a dingsak sawm le ni te nei hi.
Taciang minam a dingsak te in ki enna hang in Joseph sia Egypt ngam ah zuak uh hi napi: Pathian in ompui a,
Haksatna theampo sung pan in suatak in, Egypt kumpipa Pharaoh mai ah ciimna le maipha pia hi; taciang Egypt ngam le ama inn theampo tung ah a uk tu in vawt hi.
Egypt ngam le Canaan ngamsung theampo ah kialtung a, taciang haksatna lianpi theng ahikom in i pu i pa te bangma neak tu muzo ngawl uh hi.
Ahihang Jacob in Egypt ngam ah an om hi, ci a zak ciang in, i pu le pa te a masabel in paisak hi.
Taciang a ni veina ciang in Joseph in a suapui te kung ah ama thu hesak a; taciang Joseph i mealheak te sia Pharaoh kung ah hesak hi.
Tua zawkciang in Joseph in paisak a, a pa Jacob le a mealheak theampo mihing sawm sali le nga te sia ama kung ah sam hi.
Tua ahikom Jacob sia Egypt ngam ah pai a, ama le i pupi te tuak ah thi hi,
A luanghawm sia Shechem ah pua uh a, Abraham in Hamor tapa kung pan dangka taw a lei sa than ah vui hi. Hamor sia Shechem i pa a hihi.
Ahihang Pathian in Abraham tung ah kiciam in kamciamna hun a nai ciang in, Egypt ngam ah amate khang in pung seseam uh hi,
Joseph a he ngawl a dang kumpi khat hong khan dong in pung uh hi.
Tua kumpipa in i mipui te sia philphit tak in theambawl uh a, nausen te a nungta ngawl tu in vawk tu in i pupi te sia phatngawlna taw vawtsia uh hi.
Tua hun in Moses suak a, ama sia hoi mama hi, taciang a pa inn ah tha thum sung ki vak hi:
Taciang ama sia a puasang ah a ki vawk ciang in, Pharaoh tanu in la a, ama tapa tu in vak hi.
Tua Moses in Egypt te pilna theampo sin a, ama sia kampau le sepna ah lawcing mama hi.
Taciang ama sia kum sawmli a phak ciang in, a suapui Israel tate ve nopna a thinsung pan hong suak hi.
Israel mi khat a man ngawl in a thuak a mu ciang in, tua pa ngum a, a vawtsia Egypt pa sia phulam in that hi:
Banghangziam cile Pathian in ama khut zang in amate suatak tu hi, ci a suapui te in he tu in ngaisun hi:
A zingciang in Israel mi ni a kihau te kung ah pai a, lemtua sawm in, note u nau nu hi; banghang in kihau nu ziam? ci hi.
Ahihang a innpam pa a vawtsia pa in Moses sawn a, nang akua in kote tung ah thunei le thukhen tu in hong vawt ziam?
Zei ni Egypt pa na thalup bang in hong that nuam ni ziam? ci hi.
Tua zawkciang hisia pa i kampau hang in Moses tai a Midian ngam ah peamta in om hi, tua mun ah tapa ni nei hi.
Kum sawm li a bo ciang in, Sinai mual duisung ah Topa vantungmi sia lophung kuang bang in kilang hi.
Tasia Moses in a mu ciang in, a mu thu lamdangsa a: en tu in a neak ciang in, Topa aw ama tung ah theng a,
Keima sia na pu le pa te i Pathian, Abraham Pathian, Isaac Pathian le Jacob Pathian ka hihi, ci hi. Tua zawkciang in Moses sia ling a, en zong en ngam ngawl hi.
Tua zawkciang in Topa in ama kung ah, na peangdap sut in: banghangziam cile na dinna mun sia a thiangtho leitang a hihi.
Keima in ka mu zo hi, Egypt ngam ah ka mite haksatna sia keima in mu zo khi hi, taciang amate tauna ka za zo a, suatak tu in kong tuaksuk hi. Taciang tu in hongpai tan, Egypt ngam ah hong sawl tu khi hi, ci hi.
Hi Moses sia amate in nial uh a, kua in nangma sia hong uk tu le thukhen tu in hong vawt ziam? ci uh hi. Pathian in Moses sia lophung sung pan ama tung ah a kilang vantungmi i khut tungtawn in ukpa le ngumpa tu in paisak hi.
Moses in amate pusua pui a, tua zawkciang in Egypt ngam, san tuipi le senneal ngam sung ah kum sawm li sung, nalamdang le musakna tampi te lak hi.
Topa na Pathian in keima bang kamsang khat, na suapui te sung pan ka piangsak tu a; note in a thu na ngai tu uh hi, tabang in Israel tate a sonpa sia Moses a hihi.
Ama sia senneal ngamsung ah a kikhawm te kung ah ahizong, Sinai mual ah vantungmi taw a ki paupui na ah ahizong, taciang i pu i pa te taw ahizong, omkhawm ngei a: ama sia eite tung ah hongpiak tu a nungta kammal te a sang pa a hihi:
I pu i pa te in thu ni ngawl uh a, amate kung pan sawnthal uh hi, taciang amate thinsung pan in Egypt ngam ah heakkik uh hi,
Amate in Aaron tung ah, kote i mai ah a pai tu in pathian te hong vawtsak tan: banghangziam cile Egypt ngam pan hong pusua Moses sia bangsuak, ci ka he bua uh hi, ci uh hi.
Taciang tua hun sung in amate in khuino vawt uh a, milim tung ah biakpiakna pia uh hi, taciang amate khut taw a vawttawm nate tung ah lungdam in om uh hi.
Tua zawkciang in Pathian in amate nungngat a, van aksi te bia tu in koicip hi; kamsang te laibu sung ah a ki atsa bang in, Maw, no Israel minam te, senneal ngam ah kum sawm li sung a ki thatlum ngamsa te le biakpiakna te nong pia uh ziam?
Note in Molech i biakbuk le na aksi pathian Rephan, na biak tu in na vawttawm uh milim te na keng uh hi: tua ahikom keima in note sia Babylon ngalkhat dong in kong pua tu hi.
I pu le pa te in senneal ngam sung ah biakbuk tetti te nei hi, Moses tung son uh a, a mu uh lim bangma in, vawt tu in sawl uh hi.
Tua zawkciang in i pu le pa te in tua biakbuk sia Gentile te i neisa ngamsung ah Joshua taw tumpui uh hi, tua Gentile te sia Pathian in David hun dong i pu le pa te mai pan in hawlkhia siat hi.
David in Pathian mai ah maipha nga a, Jacob Pathian atu biakbuk sa tu in ngen hi.
Ahihang Solomon in Pathian atu in inn sa hi.
Ahihang a sangbel Pathian sia khut taw a kisa biakinn sung ah om ngawl hi; kamsang i a son na ah,
Vantung sia ka kumpi tokhum hi a, leitung sia ka peang ngakna hi, bangbang inn kei atu satu nu ziam? a hibale ka tawlngak na mun sia bang ziam?
Hi thu te theampo sia keima khut taw ka vawt hi ngawl ziam? ci hi.
Note ngawng ngu khoh te le thinsung le nakheng vunteap tan ngawl te awng, note in Tha Thiangtho sia na khak tawntung uh hi; na pu le pa te i a vawt uh bang in note in zong na vawt uh hi.
Kamsang te sung pan na pu le pa te in a vawtsiat ngawl khat beak a om ziam? Mi thutang pa hongpai natu thu a pualak te sia amate in that uh a; tu in note sia tua mi thutang pa zuak te le a that te na hi uh hi:
Vantungmi te i hu na taw thukham na sang uh a, na zui bua uh hi, ci hi.
Amate in hi thu te a zak uh ciang in, nasiatak in thin-uk mama uh a, a ha te ngoai uh hi.
Ahihang Stephen sia Tha Thiangtho taw kidim in, vantung lam tangtak in ento hi, taciang Pathian vangletna le Jesus sia Pathian ziatsang ah a ding mu hi.
En vun, van ki hong a, Pathian ziatsang ah mihing Tapa a ding ka mu hi, ci hi.
Tua zawkciang in aw ngingtak in au uh a, a bil uh hum in, thinkhat lungkhat in Stephen sang ah hong tai uh hi,
Taciang khuapua ah nawt uh a, suangtum taw deang uh hi: taciang tetti te in a nik le puan te sia tangvalpa peang ah koi uh hi, tua tangvalpa min sia Saul a hihi.
Amate in Stephen sia suangtum taw deang uh hi, taciang Stephen in, Pathian sam a, Topa Jesus awng, ka tha hong sang tan, ci hi.
Taciang khupdin a, Topa awng, hi mawna sia amate tung ah koi heak in, ci in a ngingtak in au hi, tabang a au zawkciang in ama mutthip hi.
Taciang Stephen i thina ah Sawl a lungkim hi. Tua hun sung in Jerusalem pawlpi langpan in vawtsiatna lianpi om hi; sawltak te simngawl, thu um mite theampo sia Judah ngam le Samaria ngam muntheampo ah peakkeak uh hi.
Stephen sia biakna sang a kipia mite in zawng in vui uh hi, taciang nasiatak in kaa uh hi.
Saul sia inn sim ah tum a, numei pasal ci ngawl in kaikeak siat hi, taciang thonginn ah ap in, pawlpi susia hi.
Tua ahikom mun theampo ah a ki thethang te sia mun tatuam ah pai in Pathian thu tangko tek uh hi.
Tua zawkciang in Philip sia Samaria khuapi ah pai a, amate tung ah Christ thuhil hi.
Taciang Philip in nalamdang te a vawtna za uh a, a mu uh hu in a thuhil nate sia mite in thukimtak in phatak in ngai uh hi.
Banghangziam cile doai te nangawn in au in, amate i thin-apsak mihing te sung pan pusuak uh hi: taciang pumzaw te le peangbai te zong damsak hi.
Taciang tua khuapi sung ah lungdamna lianpi om hi.
Ahihang Simon a kici mi khat om a, ama sia nidang in tua khuapi sung ah bum le ai zang in Samaria mite bum a, ama le ama mi thupi khat in ki son hi.
Mi theampo, a nobel pan a lianbel dong in a thu phatak in ni uh a, hisia pa sia Pathian vangletna lianpi hi, ci uh hi.
Hun saupi sung bum le ai taw ngual a bum hu in, ngual in ama sia zakta uh hi.
Ahihang Philip in Pathian kumpingam le Jesus Christ min taw kisai thu te a hil ciang in, numei zong pasal zong tui ki phum uh hi.
Tua zawkciang in Simon ama tatak zong in um hi: taciang tui a ki phum zawkciang in, Philip taw ki thawl hi, taciang nalamdang le musakna vawtna te lamdangsa mama in en hi.
Tu in Jerusalem a om sawltak te in Samaria mite in Pathian thu sang zo uh hi, ci a zak uh ciang in Peter le John sia amate kung ah paisak uh a:
Amate a thet uh ciang in, Tha Thiangtho a nga thei natu in thungetsak hi:
Banghangziam cile Tha Thiangtho sia kuama tung ah theng ngawl lai hi: Topa Jesus min taw tui ki phum bek sang pheang uh hi.
Tua zawkciang in Peter le John in amate tung ah a khut te nga uh hi, taciang amate in Tha Thiangtho sang uh uh.
Taciang sawltak te in khutngakna tungtawn in Tha Thiangtho piakna sia Simon in a mu ciang in, sawltak te dangka pia a,
Akuapo tung ah khut ka nga ahizong Tha Thiangtho a san thei natu in, hi vangletna kei zong hong pia tavun, ci hi.
Ahihang Peter in ama tung ah, na dangka sia nangma taw ki lalcip tahen, banghangziam cile nangma in Pathian letsong sia dangka taw lei thei tu in na ngaisun hi.
Hi thu sia nang in bangma kihel thei na le na san tu om ngawl hi: banghangziam cile Pathian mai ah na thinsung pha ngawl hi.
Tua ahikom hi na phatngawlna pan in kisik in a, Pathian kung ah thungen in, tabang hile na thinsung ngaisutna mawna hong maisak tu hi.
Banghangziam cile nangma sia a kha mama thinkha sung ah na om a, phatngawlna in hong hencip hi, ci ka he hi, ci hi.
Tua zawkciang in Simon in, na son thu te theampo khat zong ka tung ah hong thet ngawl natu in, Topa tung ah thu hong ngetsak tavun, ci hi.
Taciang amate in Topa thuhil le tetti a pan zawk uh ciang Jerusalem ah heakkik uh a, Samaria mite khua tampi ah lungdamna thuhil uh hi.
Taciang Topa vantungmi in Philip tung ah, ding in a, Jerusalem pan Gaza paina lampi thangsang ah paisuk in, tua mun sia senneal ngam a hihi, ci hi.
Taciang Pihlip sia ding in pai hi: taciang, en in, Ethiopa mi cil ki nget khat, Ethiopia kumpinu Candace khut nuai ah za lian mama le neisa theampo a keampa sia Jerusalem ah Pathian bia tu in hongpai a,
Ama sia a ciakik lam in, siphu leang to in kamsang Isaiah laibu sim hi.
Thaa in Philip tung ah, neakphei in a, hi siphu leang tung ah ama taw paikhawm vun, ci hi.
Philip sia tua pa kung ah tai a, kamsang Isaiah laibu a sim za hi, taciang na sim sia na tel ziam? ci hi.
Tua pa in, mi khatpo in hong hil bua ahile, bangbang in tel thei tu khi ziam? ci hi. Taciang ama in Philip sia siphu leang tung ah kato in ama taw tokhawm tu in sam hi.
Laithiangtho a sim na mun sia, Ama sia ngaw tu in a ki paipui tuu bang hi; taciang a mulmet pa mai ah a ham ngawl tuuno bang in, Ama sia a kam zong ka ngawl hi:
Ki zawnsak na sung ah a man ngawl in thukhenna thuak hi: taciang akua in ama suan te tung ah tangko tu ziam? banghangziam cile ama nuntakna sia hi leitung pan in la uh hi, a ci na mun a hihi.
Taciang tua cil ki nget pa in Philip zo kik a, kong thum hi, hong son tan, kamsang in akua thu son ziam? ama thu ziam, a hibale midang thu son ziam? ci hi.
Tua zawkciang in Philip in a kam hong a, tua laithiangtho pan kipan in, Jesus thu sia ama tung ah hil hi.
Tabang in amate lampi dung ah a pai uh laitak in, tui omna mun ah theng uh a: tua cil ki nget pa in, en in, hi mun ah tui om hi; tui ki phum tu bang in hong khak ziam? ci hi.
Taciang Philip in, na thinsung theampo taw na um nale, ki phum thei ni hi, ci hi. Taciang ama in, Jesus Christ sia Pathian Tapa hi, ci ka um hi, ci in zo hi.
Taciang ama in siphu leang tawlnga tu in thupia a: a ni in tuisung ah tuaksuk uh hi, taciang Philip in ama tuiphumna pia hi.
Taciang amate tui sung pan a pusua uh ciang in, Topa Thaa in Philip lato a, tua pa in mu kik nawn ngawl hi: taciang lungdamtak in a lampi dung ah paisuak hi.
Ahihang Philip sia Azotus khua ah, mite in mu uh a: Caesarea a thet dong khuapi theampo ah Pathian thuhil hi.
Taciang Saul in Topa nungzui te that tu in nasiatak in tawng tawntung lai a, thiampi sang pa kung ah pai in,
Ama tung pan in, Damascus synagogue te tung piak tu lai te ngen hi, tua mun ah Topa lampi zui te a mu le, numei pasal ci ngawl, hen in Jerusalem ah paipui sawm hi.
Saul ama sia khualhaw in, Damascus a thet dektak ciang, thakhatthu in van pan khuavak in a kimkot teng tan hi:
Ama sia lei ah pusuk a, Saul, Saul, banghang hong vawtsia ni ziam? ci aw za hi.
Saul in, Topa awng, akua ni ziam? ci hi. Taciang Topa in, Keima sia na vawtsiat Jesus khi hi: nangma atu in a zum khat sui sia thuakhak mama hi, ci hi.
Taciang ama sia ling va dil le laukawm in, Topa awng, bang hong vawtsak nuam ni ziam? ci hi. Taciang Topa in ama tung ah, Ding in a, khuapi sung ah pai in, taciang na vawt hamtang tu thu kong son tu hi, ci hi.
Taciang ama taw khualhaw te in aw nging za uh hinapi, mihing khat zong mu ngawl uh a hikom kamkhat zong pau ngawl in ding uh hi.
Saul sia lei pan tho to a; a mit a ha ciang in, mihing kuama mu ngawl hi: ahihang amate in a khut pan kai a, Damascus khua sung ah paipui hi.
Taciang ni thum sung khua mu ngawl a, an ne ngawl in tui zong dawn ngawl hi.
Damascus khuasung ah Ananias a kici nungzui khat om hi; taciang Topa in mangmusak na sung pan in ama kung ah, Ananias awng, ci hi. Taciang ama in, en in, Topa awng, keima hiak ah ka om hi, ci hi.
Topa in ama tung ah, Ding in a, a Tang, a kici lampi ah pai tan, taciang Judah inn ah Tarsus khuami, Saul a kici mi khat zong in: banghangziam cile, en in, ama thungen in om hi,
Taciang ama in Ananias a kici mi khat tum a, khua a mu thei natu in, ama tung ah a khut a ngak sia mangmu na sung ah mu zo hi, ci hi.
Ananias in, Topa awng, Jerusalem ah na mithiangtho te kung ah phat ngawlna a vawt bangza in tam ci, hisia pa thu mi tampi te tung pan in ka za zo hi:
Taciang na min hong sam theampo hen tu in thiampi lian te tung pan thuneina nei hi, ci in zo hi.
Ahihang Topa in Ananias tung ah, Pai in, banghangziam cile ama sia keima atu in a kiteal beal hi a, Gentile mite, kumpi te le Israel tate mai ah ka min a pua tu pa hi:
Banghangziam cile keima in ama sia ka min hang in a thuak hamtang tu te bangza in lian ziam, ci sia kong lak tu hi, ci hi.
Taciang Ananias pai a, inn sung ah tum hi; Saul tung ah a khut nga a, suapui pa Saul awng, khua mu in, Tha Thiangtho taw na dim thei natu, nong pai na lampi, na tung ah hong kilang Topa Jesus in hong sawl hi, ci hi.
Tasia pociang in Saul i mit pan in ngasalip bang khat tak a: thakhatthu in khuamu hi, taciang ding a, tui ki phum hi.
Saul sia an a neak zawkciang in, thadim hi. Tua zawkciang in Damascus ah nungzui te taw ni tampi sung omkhawm uh hi.
Tasia pociang in synagogue sung ah Christ sia Pathian Tapa hi, ci in thuhil hi.
Ahihang a zate theampo in lamdangsa mama uh a, ama sia Jerusalem ah Jesus min a lo te theampo a susia pa hi ngawl ziam, amate a hen zawkciang, thiampi lian te kung ah a paipui nop hang hi ngawl ziam? ci uh hi.
Ahihang Saul sia thahat seseam a, Jesus in Christ a hihi, ci a pualak hu in, Damascus a om Judah mite buaisak mama hi.
Ni tampi a cin zawkciang in, Judah mite in ama that tu in kikum khawm uh hi.
Ahihang amate i pan hunlam Saul in he hi. Taciang amate in Saul that tu in kongpi te sun taw zan taw cing uh hi.
Tua zawkciang in nungzui te in Saul sia zan in paipui uh a, bawm taw luphung pan in khiasuk uh hi.
Saul sia Jerusalem a thet ciang in, nungzui te taw kikop sawm hi: ahihang amate in Saul sia nungzui hi, ci um ngawl in lau uh hi.
Ahihang Barnabas in panpui a, sawltak te kung ah paipui hi, taciang lampi ah ama in Topa mu a, Topa zong in ama paupui hi, ci le, Damascus ah Jesus min taw hangsantak in Pathian thuhil hi, ci amate tung ah tangko hi.
Taciang Saul sia Jerusalem ah amate taw sungtum le pusuak in omtek uh hi.
Taciang Topa Jesus min taw hangsantak in thuhil a, Greek mite taw ki nial uhhi: tua ahikom amate in Saul that nuam uh hi.
Tua thu suapui te in a heak uh ciang in, Caesaria ah paipui uh a, Tarsus ah puak uh hi.
Tua zawkciang in Judah ngam, Galilee ngam le Samaria ngam theampo ah pawlpi te thinnopna taw kiptak in om uh hi; taciang Topa zatakna le Tha Thiangtho henepna sung ah nungta in, khangto uh hi.
Peter sia mun tatuam ah khualhaw a, Lydda khua a om mithiangtho te kung theng hi.
Tua mun ah Aeneas a kici khat taw ki mu hi, ama sia a pumzaw a, lupmun tung ah kum liat sung tho thei ngawl in lum hi.
Peter in ama tung ah, Aeneas awng, Jesus Christ in hong damsak hi: tho in a, na lupna zial in, ci hi. Tasia pociang in tho hi.
Taciang Lydda le Sharon ah a om theampo in mu uh a, Topa sang ah heakkik uh hi.
Tu in Joppa khua ah Tabitha a kici nungzui khat om hi. Tabitha a khiakna sia Dorcas a cinopna a hihi: hi numei in na pha tampi vawt a, mizawng tampi hu hi.
Tua ni in, ama sia a cina in thi hi: taciang amate in a luang a sil zawk uh ciang, inn tung doituam ah sial uh hi.
Lydda sia Joppa taw kinai ahikom in nungzui te in Peter tua mun ah om hi, ci za uh a, manlangtak in hongpai natu in, mihing sawl in sam uh hi.
Taciang Peter ding in amate taw pai hi. A thet uh ciang in Peter sia inntung doituam ah paipui uh hi: tua mun ah meingong te theampo a hui ah ding in kap lialua uh a, a nuntaklai a ta laktong le puan te zong lak hi.
Peter in amate pusuaksak siat a, khupdin in thu a nget zawkciang, a luang sang ah kihei in, Tabitha, tho in, ci hi. Taciang a mit hong hak a: Peter a mu ciang in, to hi.
Peter in a khut thak in kaito a, mithiangtho te le meingong te a sap zawkciang in, a nungta in ap hi.
Tua thu sia Joppa khua sung theampo ah thang a; mi tampi in Topa um uh hi.
Peter sia Joppa khua ah savun vawtpa Simon kung ah ni tampi sung om hi.
Caesarea khua ah Cornelius a kici khat om hi, ama sia Italy ngalkap hon, a kici ngalkap zakhat uk ngalkapmang a hihi,
Ama sia biakna sang ah a kipia khat hi a, a innkuan bup taw Pathian zakta, mizawng te huna tampi pia a, tatsat ngawl in Pathian tung ah thu a ngen pa a hihi.
Nitak nai thum kiim pawl in a thiangtak in a mangmuna sung ah, Pathian vantungmi khat a kung ah hongpai a, Cornelius, ci in sam hi.
Tua vantungmi laukawm in en a, bang thu ziam, Topa? ci hi. Vantungmi in, na thungetna te le mizawngte na hu nate Pathian mai ah theng a, Pathian in hong ciamte hi.
Tu in mihing pawlkhat Joppa ah paisak in, Simon Peter kici pa samsak tan.
Ama sia tuipi hui ah a teang savun vawt Simon inn ah zintung hi: hi Simon inn sia tuihui ah om a, ama in na vawt tu a kiphu te hong son tu hi, ci hi.
Cornelius a paupui vantungmi a heakkik zawkciang in, a naseam ni le biakna sang ki pia a, tatsat ngawl in ama a cing ngalkap khat sam hi;
Hi thu te theampo a son zawkciang in, Joppa ah paisak hi.
A zingciang in, amate khual a haw uh laitak, Joppa a thet dektak uh ciang, Peter sia sun nai sawmleni kiim pawl in, inn tung ah thungen tu in kato hi:
Peter sia a ngilkial mama a, an ne nuam napi: an neak tu a vawt laitak in mangmu hi.
Van kihong a, puan a ki pheak kingli nei a lian mama na koina taw akibang khat leitung ama kung ah hong ki khiasuk mu hi:
A sung ah peang li nei nganhing a tatuam, sapi te, a bokvak te le van a leang vacim te om hi.
Aw khat in ama tung ah, Peter awng; tho in, ngo in a, ne in, ci hi.
Ahihang Peter in, hi ngawl hi, Topa awng; banghangziam cile a nin le a thiangtho ngawl te ne ngei ngawl khi hi, ci hi.
Pathian in a thianthosak te nin hi ci heak in, taciang tua aw in a nivei na son thua hi.
Hisia thumvei dong tabang in vawt hi: taciang tua na koina sia van ah ki lato kik hi.
Peter in hi mangmuna a mu sia a khiakna a lungman laitak in, en vun, Cornelius kung pan a paisak te in Simon inn zong in kongbiang mai ah ding uh hi.
Taciang a sap zawkciang in, Peter a kici Simon sia hiak ah hong tung ziam, ci in dong uh hi.
Peter in tua mangmuna thu a ngaisut laitak in, Thaa in, en in, mihing thum in nang hong zong hi.
Tua ahikom tho in a, tuaksuk in, bangma lungmang heak in, banghangziam cile amate sia keima i sawl a hihi, ci hi.
Tua zawkciang in Peter sia Cornelius i sawl te kung ah tuaksuk a, en vun, na zon uh sia keima khi hi: banghang in hongpai nu ziam? ci hi.
Amate in, ngalkap zakhat uk ngalkap mangpa, mi thutang, Pathian a zakta le Judah minam theampo sung ah minpha, Cornelius in Pathian kung pan kidop piakna thu theng a, a thiangtho vantungmi in ama inn ah hongsawl tu hi, taciang na thu ngai tu hi, ci hi.
Tua zawkciang in Peter in amate sia innsung ah sam a, zan taam hi. Taciang a zingciang in Peter sia amate taw pai khawm a, Joppa ah suapui te in zong zui uh hi.
A zingciang in amate sia Caesarea ah tum uh hi. Taciang Cornelius in a mealheak te le a lawmte kaikhawm khol in ngak tek uh hi.
Peter a tum ciang in, Cornelius in muak a, a peang ah kun in bia hi.
Ahihang Peter in ama kaito a, ding in; keima zong mihing ma khi hi, ci hi.
Peter in a paupui kawm in innsung ah tum uh ha, a pai tam mama mu hi.
Peter in amate tung ah, Judah mi khat mi namdang te taw ki thawl tu, a hibale, a kung ah pai tu sia ngeina om ngawl hi, ci na he tek uh hi; ahihang khatpo sia a nin, a hibale, a thiangtho ngawl, kici ngawl tu in Pathian in hong lak zo hi.
Tua ahikom note kung ah hong sawl pociang, nial ngawl in kongpai hi: tua ahikom bang deina atu in hong sam nu ziam? ci kong dong hi, ci hi.
Taciang Cornelius in, a bosa ni li lai in hi hun ciang dong an ka tang a; nitak nai thum ciang in ka innsung ah thungen khi hi, taciang, en in, puan pak sil mikhat ka mai ah hong ding a,
Cornelius awng, Pathian in na thungetna hong za zo hi, mizawng te na hu nate ciamte hi.
Tua ahikom Peter a kici Simon sia hiak ah sam tu in Joppa ah mi sawl in; ama sia tuihui ah savun vawtpa Simon inn ah tung hi: taciang hongpai ciang in ama in thu hong hil tu hi, ci hong son hi.
Tua ahikom tasia pociang in na kung ah mi hongpaisak khi hi; taciang nongpai man in pha hi. Tua ahikom tu in Pathian kung pan na thupiak theampo ngai tu in, ka vekpi in hi mun Pathian mai ah om khawm khu hi, ci hi.
Tua zawkciang in Peter in a kam hong a, Pathian sia mi doidan nei ngawl hi, a ci thuman sia ka he hi:
Ahihang Ama a zakta te le thutanna a vawt minam peuma sia Pathian in sang hi.
Na theampo i Topa: Jesus Christ tungtawn in a ki pualak kilemna thu sia Pathian in Israel te kung ah paisak hi:
Tua thu ka sonna sia note in na he uh a, tuiphumna a man ciang in John in pualak hi, taciang Galilee pan kipan a, Judah ngamsung theampo ah tangko hi;
Nazareth mi Jesus sia Pathian in Tha Thiangtho le vangletna taw sathau buak hi: napha vawt in pai a, doai i nencip te theampo damsak hi; banghangziam cile Ama sia Pathian in ompui hi.
Kote sia Jerusalem pan kipan in Judah ngamsung ah a vawt theampo sung ah, a tetti te ka hi uh hi; amate in Jesus sia that uh a, thing tung ah khai uh hi:
Pathian in Ama sia ni thum ni ciang in thokiksak a, a kilang in lak hi;
Mi theampo tung ah hi ngawl in, Pathian mai ah tealsa tetti te, thina pan a thawkkik zawkciang in Ama taw a ne le a dawn khawm kote tung ah hong lak hi.
Taciang midang te tung ah phuang tu le Ama sia mihing le mithi te thukhen tu in Pathian in nasep a piak a hihi, ci tettipang tu in thu hong pia hi.
Kamsang theampo in ama huvau son siat uh hi. Ama a umte theampo mihing sim in ama min vangletna taw a mawna uh ki maisak tu hi ci in son uh hi, ci hi.
Peter in hi thu te a son laitak in Pathian thu a za te tung ah Tha Thiangtho hong theng hi.
Taciang Peter taw hongpai te theampo, vunteap tanna a um te in lamdangsa mama uh hi, banghangziam cile Gentile te tung ah zong Tha Thiangtho letsong buak hi.
Banghangziam cile amate in, kam tatuam in a pau uh za uh hi. Taciang Pathian pok uh hi. Tua zawkcang in Peter in zo kik a,
Koma bangma in Tha Thiangtho a sang te tuiphumna sang ngawl tu in, khatpo in tui a khak thei tu ziam? ci hi.
Taciang Peter in Topa min taw tuiphumna sang tu in thupia hi. Tua zawkciang in amate in Peter kung ah ni tampi taam tu in ngen uh hi.
Gentile te in zong Pathian thu sang zo uh hi, ci Judah ngamsung ah a om sawltak te le suapui te in za uh hi.
Taciang Peter sia Jerusalem ah a thet ciang in, vunteap tan te in ama nalh uh a,
Vunteap at ngawl te kung ah na pai a, amate taw an na ne hi, ci uh hi.
Ahihang Peter in tua thu sia a kipat pan in sonkik a, a ban a ban in amate son siat hi,
Joppa khua ah thu ka nget laitak in, mang ka mu na sung ah, puanlam zai mama taw a kibang kingli nei na koina khat van pan hong ki khiasuk a, ka kung ah hong theng hi:
A tung ah phatak in ka en a, ka ngaisut ciang in, a sung ah leitung nganhing peang li nei a tatuam, sapi te, a bokvak te le van a leang vacim te ka mu hi.
Taciang aw khat ka za a, Peter awng, tho in, ngo in a, ne in, hong ci hi.
Ahihang keima in, hi ngawl hi, Topa awng: banghangziam cile a nin, ahible, a thiangtho ngawl peuma ka kamsung ah bangmahun in tum ngei ngawl hi, ka ci hi.
Ahihang van pan in tua aw in, Pathian i a thianthosak te nangma in nin hi ci heak in, ci in hong zo kik hi.
Hisia bang in thumvei dong hong ci hi: taciang a vekpi in van ah lato kik siat hi.
Taciang, en vun, tasia pociang in Caesarea pan hong kisawl mihing thum te sia ka omna mun inn ah hong theng uh hi.
Taciang in bangma ngaisun nawn ngawl in amate taw pai tu in Thaa in hong sawl hi. Tuabek domngawl in hi suapui luk te in hong zui uh hi, taciang Corneliua innsung ah tum tek khu hi:
Taciang Cornelius in a innsung ah vantungmi a mu na thu hong son hi, tua vantungmi sia ding a a kung ah, Joppa khua ah mi sawl in a, Peter a kici Simon sam in;
Ama in thu hong hil tu a, tabang in nangma le na innkuan bup in ngupna na nga tu uh hi, ci in son hi.
Taciang thuhil ka kipan a, a kipat in kote tung ah Tha Thiangtho hong thet bangma in amate tung zong ah theng hi.
Tua zawkciang in, John in tui taw tuiphumna hong pia takpi hi; ahihang note Tha Thiangtho taw tuiphumna na sang tu uh hi, a ci Topa kammal ka phawkkik hi.
Banghangziam cile Pathian in Topa Jesus Christ a um te tung ah letsong a piak sia, kote hongpiak taw a kibang a hihi; Pathian khak zo tu in keima sia akua khi ziam? ci hi.
Amate in hi thu te a zak uh ciang in, thim khipkhep in om uh a, Pathian in Gentile mite zong nuntakna atu maw ki sikkik na pia zohi, ci in Pathian poktek uh hi.
Stephen thu pan vawtsiatna hang in mun tatuam ah a ki thethang te sia, Phoenicia, Cyprus le Antioch ciang dong pai a, Pathian thu midang te tung ah hil ngawl in Judah mite tung bek ah hil hi.
Ahihang Cyprus le Cyrene a om mi pawlkhat te in, Antioch a thet ciang in, Greek te paupui a, Topa Jesus thuhil hi.
Taciang Topa khut amate tung ah om hi: tabang in mi tampi te in um uh a, Topa kung ah hong heakkik uh hi.
Tua zawkciang in hi thupha sia Jerusalem pawlpi dong ah hong theng hi: taciang amate in Barnabas sia Antioch dong pai tu in sawl uh hi.
Barnabas sia Antioch a thet ciang in Pathian i hesuakna mu a, angtang mama hi, taciang amate theampo in thinsung ngealna taw Topa beal tu in hanthawn hi.
Banghangziam cile Barnabas sia mipha hi a, Tha Thiangtho le upna taw kidim hi: taciang mi tampi te Topa kung ah kibelap hi.
Tua zawkciang in Barnabas sia Saul zong tu in Tarsus ah pai hi:
A mu ngawl ciang in Antioch ah paipui hi. Ama te sia kum khat sung buppi pawlpi taw kikhawm uh a, mi tampi te thuhil hi. Taciang nungzui te sia, Christian te, a kici phitbel na sia Antioch khua ah a hihi.
Tua hun sung in kamsang te sia Jerusalem pan in Antioch ah hongpai uh hi.
Amate sung pan Agabus a kici kamsang khat hong ding a, leitung mun theampo ah kialpi tung tu hi, ci in thaa in telsak hi: tua kialpi sia Claudius Caesar hun lai in tung hi.
Nungzui te in amate hi thei za tek taw Judah ngam a om suapui te hu na thak tu in khensatna nei tek uh a:
Amate in upa te kung ah Barnabas le Saul te khut tungtawn in thak uh hi.
Tua hun pawl in Herod kumpipa in pawlpi sung mi pawlkhat te vawtsiat tu in man hi.
Taciang John i suapuipa James sia namsau taw that hi.
Hi thu in Judah mite lungkimsak hi, ci a mu ciang in, Peter zong mat thua sawm hi. Hi hun sia tol saw ngawl anluum poai hun sung a hihi.
Taciang Peter a mat zawkciang in thongtaksak a, ngalkap sawm le luk in cing tu in ap hi; taciang paisanpoai zawkciang in mihon mai ah pusua tu in ngeal hi.
Tua ahikom Peter sia thong sung ah koi nginge hi: ahihang pawlpi te in ama atu in Pathian tung ah tatsat ngawl in thungetsak uh hi.
Taciang Herod in a pusua tu ni zan ciang in, Peter sia ngalkap ni te ki laklaw ah thikkhol ni taw hen in mu hi: a cingte in kongkha maipan in thonginn cing nginge uh hi.
En vun, Topa vantungmi sia a kung ah hongpai a, thonginn sung ah khuavak tang hi: Peter pang pan in beang a, thosak hi, taciang manlang in tho in, ci hi. Taciang in a khut pan thikkhau te tak hi.
Vantungmi in ama kung ah, na kawngkhau kil in a, na peangdap bul in, ci hi. Taciang a son bang in Peter in vawt hi. Na puan sil in a, hong zui tan, ci hi.
Peter pusuak in, vangtungmi zui hi; taciang vantungmi i vawt teng sia a tatak hi, ci a he bua hi; ahihang mangmu bang in ki ngaisun hi.
Inn doi khat na le doi ni na a kan zawkciang in, khuapi sung paina thik kongpi dong theng hi; tua thik kongpi sia amathu in kihong a: amate a puasang ah pusuak uh hi, taciang lampi khat dungzui in a pai zawk uh ciang; vantungmi in Peter nusia hi.
Peter a khang hong ciim a, a tel thiang kik ciang, tu in a thiangtak in ka tel hi, Topa in Ama vantungmi sawl in, Herod khut le Judah mite lametna pan in hong suatak zo hi, ci hi.
Peter in hi thu a ngaisut zawkciang in, Mark a kici John nu Mary te inn ah pai hi; tua mun ah mi tampi te thungen in ki khawm uh hi.
Taciang Peter in kongpi i kongkha a kik ciang in, Rhoda a kici naseam nu in ngai tu in pai hi.
Taciang Rhoda in Peter aw hi, ci a heak ciang in, lungdam lei ahikom kongpi hong ngawl in, innsung ah tai hi, taciang kongpi mai ah Peter ding hi, ci in son hi.
Amate in, mawmaw ni hi, ci uh hi. Ahihang, a tatak a hihi, ci valeng hi. Tua zawkciang in amate in, ama i vantungmi hi tu hi, ci uh hi.
Ahihang Peter in king top lai hi: taciang amate in kongkha a hon uh ciang in, Peter mu uh a, lamdangsa mama uh hi.
Ahihang Peter in a thim natu in a khut taw lak a, Topa in thong sung pan bangbang in pusua, ci thu amate tung ah pualak hi. Taciang James le suapui te kung ah pai tavun a hi thu te son tavun, ci hi. Taciang amate pusuak uh a mundang ah pai uh hi.
Khua a vak pociang Peter sia bangsuak ci thu taw kisai in ngalkap te sung ah buaina lianpi hong piang hi.
Herod in Peter a zon ciang in, mu ngawl a, a cing te thusit in, thalup natu thu pia hi. Taciang Herod sia Judah ngam pan pusuak a Caesarea ah pai a, tua mun ah tam hi.
Herod sia Tyre le Sidon mite tung ah nasiatak in lungkim ngawl hi: ahihang amate thu kisi tak in Herod kung ah hongpai uh hi, taciang kumpipa lupna inndoi cingpa Blastus pawlvawt uh in, kilemna ngen uh hi; banghangziam cile amate ngam sia Herod ngam sung pan hongpai an le tui taw nungta a hi uh hi.
A ciangtan ni in Herod sia kumpi puan taw ki pua a, kumpi tokhum tung ah to in mipi te tung ah thu son hi.
Taciang mite in, hisia sia mihing aw hi ngawl hi, pathian aw hi, ci au uh hi.
Tasia pociang Topa vantungmi in Herod vel hi, banghangziam cile ama in Pathian minthanna pia ngawl hi: ama sia than in ne a, thi hi.
Ahihang Pathian thu khang in ki zel hi.
Barnabas le Saul sia amate nasep a man uh ciang in Jerusalem pan hong heakkik uh a, Mark a kici John hong tonpui uh hi.
Antioch pawlpi sung ah, kamsang le sya pawlkhat om hi; amate sia Barnabas, Niger a kici Simeom, Cyrene khuami Lucius, ngam uk Herod taw a khang khawm pa Manaen le Saul te a hihi.
Amate sia Topa naseam uh a, an a tan uh ciang in, Tha Thiangtho in Barnabas le Saul sia amate ka sap nathu nasep seam tu in a tuam in hong koi tuamsak tavun, ci hi.
Taciang amate antang in thu a nget zawk uh ciang, Barnabas le Saul tung ah khut nga in, paisak uh hi.
Tha Thiangtho in a sawl bangma in, Barnabas le Saul sia Seleucia ah pai uh a; tua mun pan in Cyprus ah tembaw taw pai uh hi.
Taciang amate Salamis ah a om uh laitak in, Judah te synagogue te sung ah Pathian thuhil uh hi: taciang amate a hu tu in John zong om hi.
Tuikul sung theampo pai uh a, Pathos dong theng uh hi, tua mun ah mitbum thiam, leilot kamsang, Judah mi Bar-jesus a kici khat taw ki mu uh hi:
Ama sia Sergius Paulus a kici mipil ngam ukpa taw om khawm hi; tua Sergius Paulus in Pathian thu a zak nop man in Barnabas le Saul sam hi.
Ahihang a min khiakna mitbum thiam a kici Elymas in, ngam ukpa sia a upna pan ki khealsak tu in Barnabas le Saul te khak hi.
Tua zawkciang in Paul zong a kici Saul sia Tha Thiangtho taw kidim in, Elymas a tangtak in en a,
Nang doaimangpa tapa, leilot thu le seksolna taw a kidim, phatngawlna theampo i ngal, Topa lampi pha te suksiatna pan in tawlnga ngawl lai tu ni ziam?
Tu in, en in, Topa khut na tung ah om hi, na mittaw tu a, a ciangtan hun sung theampo ni na mu batu hi, ci hi. Taciang thakhatthu in a tung ah meikai le khuamial hong theng a; a khut pan a len tu te zong in pai hi.
Tua zawkciang in ngam ukpa in a vawt te mu in um hi, Topa hilna sia lamdangsa mama hi.
Tu in Paul le a lawm te sia Paphos pan in ngunkuang taw pai uh a, Pamphylia ngam Perga theng uh hi: taciang John sia amate kung pan pai a Jerusalem ah cia kik hi.
Ahihang Perga pan a pai ciang in, Pisidia ngam Antioch theng a, sabbath ni in synagogue sung ah tum in to hi.
Taciang thukham le kamsang te a sim zawkciang ulian te in ngual paisak a, no u le nau te, mite atu in hanthotna kammal nei na hi uh le, son vun, ci hi.
Tua zawkciang in Paul dingto in, a khut van hi, Israel mite le no Pathian zakta te, ngai vun.
Hi Israel mite Pathian in i pu le pa te teal a, Egypt ngam ah peamta bang in a om laitak in lamsang hi, taciang a ban sangpi taw Egypt ngam pan in pusua hi.
Taciang senneal ngam sung ah kum sawmli kiim anvak hi.
Canaan ngam a om minam sali te a suksiat zawkciang in, amate ngam sia aisan in hawm uh hi.
Tua zawkciang in kamsang Samuel hun hong thet ma kum zali le sawm nga sung, Pathian in thukhenmang te pia hi.
Tua zawkciang in amate in kumpi ngen uh a: Pathian in Benjamin minam Kish i tapa Saul sia kum sawmli sung pia hi.
Saul a hepkhiat zawkciang Pathian in David sia amate kumpi tu in tungto hi; taciang ama thu Pathian in tettipan na a piak na sia, ka lungtang bang a nei Jesse tapa David ka mu zo hi, ama in ka deina theampo khuangkhim tu hi, ci hi.
Pathian in ama kamciam bang in Israel te ngumtu David suan Jesus tungdingsak hi:
Jesus hongpai ma in John in mawna ki sikkik na taw kisai tuiphumna thu sia Israel mite theampo tung ah hil masa zo hi.
Taciang John in a nasep a man tu ciang in, note in keima kua nong ci uh ziam? Keima sia Ama ka hi bua hi. Ahihang, en vun, ka nung pan in khat hongpai a, a peangdap khau sutsak tu zong ka kilawm bua hi, ci hi.
U le nau te awng, Abraham tate le note sung ah Pathian a zakta te, hi ngupna thu sia note tung ah hong kipuak a hihi.
Banghangziam cile Jerusalem a om te le ulian te in Jesus a heak ngawl uh hang ahizong, sabbath ni sim in a sim kamsang te kammal te zong a heak ngawl lai uh hu in, amate in Jesus mawsak in kamsang te thu tangtungsak uh hi.
Amate in Jesus tung ah thi tak mawna a mu bua uh hi, ahihang Ama sia that tu in Pilate kung ah ngen uh hi.
Jesus thu a ki atkholsa theampo te sia amate in a tangtunsak zawk uh ciang, thing tung pan in khiasuk uh a, than ah vui uh hi.
Ahihang Pathian in Ama sia thina pan thokiksak hi:
Ama taw Galilee pan Jerusalem dong a pai te in, ni tampi sung mu uh a, tua te sia midang te tung ah Ama i tetti te a hi uh hi.
Taciang note tung ah lungdamna thupha sia kote in kong tangko uh hi, tua thu sia i pu le pa te tung a kivawt kamciam a hihi,
Tua thu sia Pathian in ko a tate kung ah Jesus a thawkiksak na tungtawn in khuagkhimsak hi; Psalm ni na sung ah, Nangma sia ka Tapa na hihi, tu ni in kong nei zo hi, ci in ki atkhol hi.
Taciang Ama sia muat ngawl tu in thina pan a thawkik na thu taw kisai in, David i a muantak hesuakna kong pia tu hi, ci hi.
Mundang Psalm sung ma ah, na mi Thiangtho a muatthong tu na oai bua hi, ci hi.
Banghangziam cile David in Pathian deina bang in ama hun mihing te atu na a sep zawkciang mu a, a pu le pa te kung ah vui in a pumpi muat hi:
Ahihang Pathian in a thawkiksak pa sia, a pumpi muat ngawl hi.
Tua ahikom u le nau te, hisia pa tungtawn in note tung ah maw maisakna thu kong hil uh hi, ci kong hesak hi:
Moses thukham tungtawn in na san thei ngawl uh thutang suana sia Jesus upna tungtawn in a um theampo na theampo pan in thutang suana nga hi.
Tua ahikom kamsang te sonkhol nate note tung ah hong thet thei ngawl natu in;
En vun, no ngual selno thei te, lamdangsa vun a, lalcip tavun: banghangziam cile no hun sung ah, ka vawt nasep sia bangbang po ahizong na um bua tu uh hi, a ci thu sia kidawm vun, ci hi.
Taciang Judah te synagogue sung pan a pusua ciang in, Gentile mite in mai sabbath ni ciang in hi thu te hil tu in ngen uh hi.
Mipi te kikhop a man uh ciang in, Judah mi tampi le Judah biakna sung a tum Gentile te in Paul le Barnabas te zui uh hi: Paul le Barnabas in Pathian thuthiamna sung ah om suak tu in hanthawn uh hi.
A mai nipi Sabbath ni ciang in Pathian thu ngai tu in tua khuapi sung om mi bup dektak hongpai uh hi.
Ahizong Judah mite in mihonpi a mu uh ciang in, hazatna taw kidim uh a, Paul i thuhil nate langpan le sonsia in pau uh hi.
Tua zawkciang in Paul le Barnabas te sia hangsan seseam uh a, Pathian thu note kong hil phot uh kul hi: ahihang note in na vawk uh a, noma le noma tawntung nuntakna nga tu kiphu ngawl in thu na khen uh hi, en vun, ko Gentile te sang ah ka kihei zo uh hi.
Banghangziam cile Topa in thu hongpiakna ah, Gentile mite khuavak hi tu in, lei mong khat dong ngupna atu hi tu in kong koi zo hi, ci hi.
Hi thu sia Gentile te in a zak uh ciang in, lungdam mama uh a, Topa thu poktek uh hi: taciang tawntung nuntakna nga tu in a koi sa te in um uh hi.
Topa thu sia tua ngamsung theampo ah kizel hi.
Ahihang Judah mite in biakna sang a ki pumpiak te le a zatakhuai nupi te, khuasung a om ulian te hanthawn uh hi, taciang Paul le Barnabas te nasia seseam in vawtsia uh a, amate ngamsung pan in hawlkhia uh hi.
Ahihang Paul le Barnabas te in a peang tung a bang leivui te thin uh a, Iconium sang ah pai uh hi.
Taciang nungzui te sia lungdamna le Tha Thiangtho taw kidim uh hi.
Iconium ah Paul le Barnabas te a ni in Judah te synagogue sung ah paikhawm uh a, thuhil hi. Tabang in Judah mite le Greek mite mihon tampi in um uh hi.
Ahihang a um ngawl Judah mite in Gentile mite hanthawn uh a, a um suapui te langpan nopna thinsung pha ngawl nei tu in vawt uh hi.
Tua ahikom amate in Topa sung ah hangsantak in thuhil uh a, hun saupi sung tam uh hi, tabang in Pathian hesuakna thu tettipanna atu in musakna te le nalamdang te amate khut tungtawn in vawt thei na pia hi.
Ahihang khuapi sung a om mihonpi te kikhen uh hi: pawlkhat te in Judah mite sang pang uh a, a dang pawlkhat te in sawltak te sang pang uh hi.
Gentile mite, Judah mite le lampui te in amate selno uh a, suangtum taw sep tu in a del uh ciang,
Amate in he uh a, Lycaonia ngamsung a om Lystra khua, Derbe khua le a kimlepam ngam te ah tai uh hi.
Taciang tua mun ah lungdamna thupha hil uh hi.
Lystra ah a khealzaw, a nu sung pan a sua pan kipan a peangbai a, a vak ngei ngawl mi khat om hi:
Tuapa in Paul thuhilna a zak ciang in: Paul in ama sia tangtak in en a, dam natu upna nei hi, ci a heak ciang in,
Na peang tung ah a tangtak in ding in, ci in a ngingtak in sawl hi. Taciang tua pa tawn in lampai hi.
Mihon te in Paul i na vawt a mu uh ciang in, amate Lycaonia kam taw, pathian te mihing bang in eite kung ah hong tuaksuk uh hi, ci in a ngingtak in au uh hi.
Amate in Barnabas sia, Jupiter, ci uh a; Paul sia a thuhilpi ahikom in Mercurius, ci uh hi.
Tua zawkciang in a khua mai ah a om Jupiter thiampi in khuital le pakkual te sia kongpi ah mihon te taw biakpiakna piak sawm hi.
Tua thu sawltak te, Paul le Barnabas in a zak uh ciang in, a nik le puan te eau keak uh hi, taciang mihon sung ah tai kawm in au uh a,
Banghang in hibang te vawt nu ziam? kote zong note bangma ka hi uh hi, hi a thupi ngawl nate pan in vantung, leitung, tuipi le a sung om theampo a vawt a nungta Pathian sang ah kihei tu in note tung ah thu ka hil uh hi:
Abosa hun sung ah Pathian in minam theampo sia amate lampi tek ah paisak hi.
Ahihang Pathian in Ama le Ama sia tetti om ngawl in koithong ngawl a na pha vawt hi, van pan in nguatui le anlak hun te hongpia a, eite i thinsung te an le lungdamna taw hong dimsak hi, ci hi.
Taciang hi thu te hil uh a, mipi te in amate tung ah biakpiakna vawt ngawl tu in khak zo vamial uh hi.
Taciang Antioch le Iconiam ah Judah mi pawlkhat te in, mihon te hanthawn uh a, Paul sia suangtum taw a den zawk uh ciang in, a thi zo sa uh a, khua puasang ah kaikeak uh hi.
Ahihang nungzui te a kiimkot ah a din tek uh laitak in thoto a, khuasung ah tum hi: taciang a zingciang in Barnabas taw Derbe ah pai uh hi.
Paul le Barnabas in Derbe khua ah lungdamna thu hil uh a, mi tampi a hil zawk uh ciang in, Lystra, Iconiam le Antioch ah heakkik uh hi.
Nungzui te nuntakna kipsak uh a, upna sung ah om paisuak tu le Pathian kumpingam sung ah haksatna tampi kantan in i tum hamtang tu hi, ci in hanthawn uh hi.
Taciang amate in pawlpi tatuam ah upa te nasep pia hi, taciang antang in thungetsak a, amate upna Topa tung ah ap uh hi.
Taciang amate in Pisidia ngam sung theampo a kantan zawk uh ciang in, Pamphylia theng uh hi.
Perga ah thu a hil zawk uh ciang in, Attalia ah pai uh hi:
Tua mun pan in tembaw taw Antioch sang ah pai uh a, Antioch ah amate sepnasa te a seam tu in Pathian i thuthiamna sung ah apna a neisakna mun a hihi.
Taciang amate Antioch a thet uh ciang in, pawlpi munkhat ah kaikhawm uh a, Pathian in amate taw a sep uh te Gentile te kung ah upna kongkha a honsak na thu te son uh hi.
Tua mun ah a nungzui te taw hun tampi omkhawm uh hi.
Judah ngam pan hongpai mi pawlkhat te in, Moses thukham bang in vunteap na tan bua uh le, ngupna nga thei ngawl tu nu hi, ci in suapui te hil uh hi.
Hite sia Paul le Barnabas te taw thu kisik ngawl na le ki nial na nasia mama nei uh ahikom in, Antioch a om pawlpi te in Paul, Barnabas le mi pawlkhat te sia hi thudokna taw kisai Jerusalem ah sawltak te le upa te kung ah then tu in khensat uh hi.
Pawlpi in lamkal ah amate tha uh a, Phoenicia le Samaria kantan in pai hi, taciang Gentile te i kikhealna thu pualak uh a: suapui te theampo nasiatak in lungdamsak hi.
Amate Jerusalem a thet uh ciang in pawlpi, sawltak te le upa te in muak a, Pathian in amate tungtawn a vawt nate theampo son uh hi.
Ahihang Pharisee te sungpan thu um pawlkhat te in Gentile thu um te sia vunteap tan kul a, Moses thukham zong zui tu in thupiak kul hi, ci uh hi.
Taciang hi thu ngaisun khawm tu in sawltak te le upa te munkhat ah ki kaikhawm uh hi.
Thu tampi a ki nial zawk uh ciang, Peter ding a, amate tung ah, u le nau te awng, Gentile mite in keima kam pan in lungdamna thupha za uh a, a up theina tu in, tuma hiat in Pathian in eite sung pan keima hong teal hi, ci na he uh hi.
Taciang thinsung a he Pathian in tettipang a, eite tung ah hongpiak bang in amate zong Tha Thiangtho pia hi;
Taciang eite le amate kilaklaw ah ki bat ngawlna bangma koi ngawl a, upna tungtawn in amate thinsung te thiangthosak hi.
Tua ahikom, tu in, i pu le pa te le eite in zong i puak zawk ngawl hakkol sia nungzui te ngawng ah koi in banghang Pathian ze-et nu ziam?
Ahihang Topa Jesus Christ i thuthiamna tungtawn in amate ngupna a nga uh bangma in eite zong i nga tu hi, ci in ka um hi, ci hi.
Tua zawkciang in Paul le Barnabas te in Gentile te sung ah Pathian in amate zang in a vawt nalamdang tatuam te a son uh ciang in, mihon pi te in thim khipkhep in ngai uh hi.
Amate thim khipkhep in a om zawk uh ciang in, James in, u le nau te awng, hong ngai tavun:
Ama min atu mi teal tu in Pathian in amasabel in Gentile mite tung ah a pai na thu Simon in hong pualak zo hi.
Taciang hi thu sia kamsang te kammal in zong lungkim uh a,
Hi thu zawkciang in kong paikik tu a, a puksa David i biakbuk sia ka sa kik tu hi; taciang a lal sa sia kasakik tu a, ka dingsak kik tu hi:
Tabang in a tanglai mihing te le Ama min taw a sap Gentile te theampo in Topa zong tu uh hi, ci in hi thu te theampo a vawt Topa in ci hi.
Pathian in leitung piancil pan in a nasep theampo he siat hi, ci ki at zo hi.
Tua ahikom keima i thukhenna sia, Gentile mite sung pan in Pathian sang ah a kihei te nawngkaisak bua tawng:
Ahihang milim taw in a thiangtho ngawl te, paktat mawna, tawlsan in a kithat sa te le thisan te pial tu in lai kong thak zaw hi.
Banghangziam cile Moses i thukham sia nidang pek pan in khua tatuam ah ki hil a, synagogue te sung zong ah sabbath nisim in ki sim tawntung hi, ci hi.
Tua zawkciang in amate sung pan in a tealsa te, Judah a kici Barsabas le suapui te sung ah a thupibel Silas te sia, Paul le Barnabas te taw Antioch ah paisak tu in, sawltak te le elder te sia pawlpi buppi in lungkim uh hi:
Taciang hibang in amate in, sawltak te, elder te le suapui te in Antioch, Syria le Cilicia a om Gentile suapui te hong paupui khu hi:
Kote kung pan in mi pawlkhat te note kung ah hongpai uh a, koma thupiak hi ngawl napi, vunteap tan hamtang tu nu hi, ciang thukham zong zui tu nu hi, ci in hong sawl na kammal in note hong nawngkaisak a, na nuntakna uh susia hi, ci thu ka za uh hi:
Munkhat ah thu kisi in omkhawm tek a, ka teal uh mihing te sia ka it mama uh Barnabas le Paul taw note kung ah kong paisak tu uh pha ka sa uh hi.
Amate sia i Topa Jesus Christ min atu in a nuntakna dong a pia ngam te a hi uh hi.
Tua ahikom Judah le Silas te kong paisak uh a, lai kong thak uh bangma in amate in a kam uh taw hongson tu uh hi.
Banghangziam cile note tung ah hi a kisam nate simngawl a lianzaw vanngit kong sot ngawl tu uh sia Tha Thiangtho le kote in pha kasa uh hi;
Tabang in note in milim tung ah na piak uh sa te, thisan, tawlsan in a kingo sa te le paktat mawna te pial vun: tabang te pan in noma le noma na ki keamcing uh le, a pha vawt na hi uh hi. Na damtek tavun, ci in laithak at uh hi.
Tua ahikom amate a paisak uh ciang in Antioch theng uh a: mihon te munkhat ah a ki kaikhop zawk uh ciang in, laithak sia pia uh hi:
Tua laithak a sim zawk uh ciang in, henepna thu ahikom in lungdam mama uh hi.
Taciang Judah le Silas te zong kamsang te ahi uh bangma in, suapui te thu tampi taw hanthawn uh a, kipsak uh hi.
Tua mun ah tawlkhat sung a om zawk uh ciang in, suapui te kung pan sawltak te kung ah a thimtham in pai uh hi.
Ahihang Silas sia tua mun ah om nuam lai hi.
Paul le Barnabas sia Antioch ah omsuak a, midang tampi te taw Topa thuhil in tangko uh hi.
Tawlkhat sung zawkciang in, Paul in Barnabas kung ah, Topa thu ka hil na uh mun khua tatuam ah suapui te ve tu in paikik tawng, bangbang in om ziam, ci en tawng, ci hi.
Taciang Barnabas in Mark a kici John sia amate taw tonpui tu in ngaisun hi.
Ahihang Paul in Pamphylia pan in amate taw kikhen a, nasep na mun ah a pai ngawl hu in, amate taw tonpui tu pha ngawl hi, ci ngaisun hi.
Tua thu Paul le Barnabas nasiatak in ki nial uh a, khat le khat kikhen uh hi: taciang Barnabas in Mark tonpui a, Cyprus sang ah tembaw taw pai hi;
Taciang Paul in Silas teal a, suapui te i Pathian thuthiamna sung ah apna taw in pai uh hi.
Taciang Syria le Cilicia ngamsung theampo ah pai kakoai uh a, pawlpi te kipsak uh hi.
Paul sia Derbe le Lystra theng uh hi: taciang, en vun, nungzui khat om a, a min sia Timothy kici hi, a nu sia Judah mi hi a, thu um mi a hihi; ahihang a pa sia Greek mi a hihi:
Lystra le Iconium a om suapui te in Timothy sia phatson mama uh hi.
Timothy sia Paul in tonpui nuam ahikom in a vunteap tansak hi, banghangziam cile tua kiim a om Judah mite theampo in a pa sia Greek mi hi, ci he uh hi.
Jerusalem ah sawltak te le upa te in zui tu in a khensat na thu sia, amate pai na khua tatuam ah ap uh hi.
Tua ahikom pawlpi te upna sung ah kho uh a, nisim in khang uh hi.
Tu in amate Phrygia le Galatia ngamsung ah pai uh a a kantan zawk uh ciang in, Tha Thiangtho in Asia ngam ah Pathian thuhil tu in hong khak hi,
Mysia ngam a thet zawk uh ciang in, Bithynia ngamsung ah paisawm uh hi: ahihang Thaa in a pai tu uh oai ngawl hi.
Taciang amate Mysia ngam kantan uh a, Troas theng uh hi.
Tua zan in Paul in mangmu hi; Macedonia mi khat ding a, Macedonia ah hongpai tan a, hong hu tan, ci in ngen hi.
Paul in mang a mu zawkpo ciang in, Macedonia ah lungdamna thupha tangko tu in Topa in hong sam hi, ci thiangtak in tel ka hi uhkom, pai tu in ka hanciam uh hi.
Tua ahikom Troas pan in ngunkuang taw ka pai uh a, Samotracia ah a tangtan in ka pai uh hi, taciang a zingciang in Neapolis ka theng uh hi;
Tua mun pan in Macedonia ngamkhen sung pan khuapi lianbel Philippi ka theng uh hi, Philippi khua sia Rome te in ngamkeak in ukna ngam a hihi: tua khuapi sung ah tawlkhat sung ka om uh hi.
Sabbath ni in ngunhui khuapi ah ka pai uh hi, thunget na mun ah ka to uh a, hongpai numei te ka paupui uh hi.
Taciang Lydia a kici Thyatira khua mi, puan sandup a zuak numei khat om a, ama sia Pathian bia khat a hihi: ama in Paul i thuhilna te ngai tu in Topa in a thinsung honsak hi.
Ama le a innkuanpui te tui a ki phum zawk uh ciang in, Topa tung ah muantak hi, ci in nong mu uh ahile, ka inn ah hongpai tavun a, taam tavun, ci in hong sam a, hong thum hi.
Thungen tu ka pai uh ciang in, a sung ah maisang thu sonkhol theina thaa nei a, a to te atu in dangka tampi a ngasak naseam numei no in hong muak hi:
Ama in Paul le kote nung pan in hongzui a, hi mite sia ngupna lampi hong lak tu a sangbel Pathian i sal te a hi uh hi, ci in au hi.
Taciang ama in hibang in ni tampi sung vawt hi. Ahihang Paul sia a thin-uk in le-et a, tua thaa kung ah, Jesus Christ min taw hi numei sung pan pusuak tu in thu kong pia hi, ci hi. Tuahun laitak lian in pusuak hi.
A to te in dangka tampi nga natu lametna om nawn ngawl hi, ci a mu uh ciang in Paul le Silas te man uh a, thukhen zum ulian te kung ah kai uh hi.
Taciang ulian te kung ah paipui a, hi Judah mite in i khuapi nasiatak in buaisak hi,
Ko Rome mite in ka san thei ngawl uh le ka zui ngawl uh ngeina te hil hi, ci uh hi.
Taciang mihonpi te hong ding tek in: ulian te in zong a puan uh eaukeaksak uh a, Paul le Silas te vel tu in thupia uh hi.
Amate in nasiatak in a sat zawk uh ciang in, thonginn sung ah khia uh a, thong cing pa in phatak a cin natu in vaitha hi:
Thu a vaithak thonginn cingpa in, thonginn doi sung ah khumsuk a, a peang te peangkol bul in koi hi.
Zan laitak in Paul le Silas sia thungen uh a, Pathian pok na lasa khawm uh hi: taciang thongtak te in za uh hi.
Thakhatthu in zin nasiatak hong ling a, thong innbul te ki lok hi: tasia pociang in kongkha te a vekpi in ki hong siat a, a ki hen na uh theampo zong ki sut siat hi.
Thongcingpa hong khanglo a, kongkha te a ki hong a mu ciang in, thongtak te taisiat zo sa a, a namsau dok in, ama le ama ki tha sawm hi.
Ahihang Paul ngingtak in au a, nangma le nangma ki vawtsia heak in: banghangziam cile ka vekpi in hi mun ah ka om nginge uh hi, ci hi.
Tua zawkciang in thongcingpa in mei ngen a, hong bingbung hi, taciang ling vadil kawm in hongpai a, Paul le Silas te mai ah bok hi,
Taciang amate pusua a, ka topa te awng, ngupna nga natu in bang ka vawt tu ziam? ci hi.
Amate in, Topa Jesus Christ um in a, nangma le na innkuanpui te ngupna na nga tu uh hi, ci uh hi.
Taciang Paul le Silas te in amate a innsung a om te theampo tung ah Topa thuhil uh hi.
Tua zan in thongcingpa in amate pusua a, a liamma uh te silsak hi; taciang ama le a innkuanpui theampo tui ki phum pai uh hi.
Saul le Silas sia ama inn ah ciapui a, amate mai ah anlui hi, taciang ama le a innkuanpui theampo in Pathian um uh a, lungdam mama uh hi.
A zingciang in, ulian te in palik mang te sawl a, tua mihing te pusua vun, ci hi.
Taciang thongcingpa in Paul kung ah, ulian te in note sam tu in mi sawl hi; tua ahikom tu in pusuak vun a, thinnuamtak in pai vun, ci hi.
Ahihang Paul in amate tung ah, kote sia Rome ngammi ka hi uh hi, mawsiatna om ngawlpi kilangtak in hong sat a, thong hong taksak hi; tu in kuama heak ngawl in hong hawlkhia nuam ziam? hi thei ngawl hi; ahihang amate hongpai ta hen a hong suatak tahen, ci hi.
Taciang palik mang te in hi thu a ulian te kung ah son uh hi: taciang amate sia Rome ngam mi hi, ci a zak uh ciang in, ulian te patau mama hi.
Taciang amate hongpai uh a, Paul te thum uh hi, taciang suatak uh a, tua khuapi sung pan pusuak tu in sawl uh hi.
Amate sia thong sung pan pusuak uh ah, Lydia te innsung ah tum uh hi: taciang suapui te a mu uh ciang in heneam uh a, paikik uh hi.
Paul le Silas sia Amphipolis le Apollonia a kantan zawk uh ciang in, Thessalonica theng uh hi, tua mun ah Judah te synagogue om hi:
Taciang Paul sia ama ngeina bang in, synagogue sung ah tum a, sabbath ni nithum sung amate taw laithiangtho sung thu te kikum uh hi.
Christ sia a thuak kul hamtang a hi na le thina pan thokik hamtang tu hi; ci in note tung ah ka pualak hi Jesus sia Christ a hihi, ci in pualak in hil thiang hi.
Amate sung pan pawlkhat te in um uh a, Paul le Silas te kipawlpui uh hi; taciang tua te sung ah biakna sang a kipumpiak Greek mihon tampi le numei lampui tampi kihel uh hi.
Ahihang a um ngawl Judah mite in haza uh a, van zuakna lamdung a vakvai mannung ngawl mite sam uh hi, taciang honpi khat hong pha uh a khuapi sung ah buaina piangsak uh hi, taciang Jason i inn sim uh a, mipi mai ah pusua tu in zong uh hi.
Taciang amate in a mu ngawl uh ciang in, Jason le suapui pawlkhat te khuapi ulian te kung ah kai uh a, hileitung lumlet te himun zong ah hongpai uh hi;
Amate sia Jason in ama inn ah tungsak hi: hi te theampo in Caesar thupiakna te langpan uh a, Jesus a kici a dang kumpi khat om hi, ci uh hi, ci in au lialua uh hi.
Hi thu te mipi te le khuapi ulian te in a zak uh ciang in, buai mama uh hi.
Taciang Jason le a dang te sia a kisam za dangka liausak uh a, tua zawkciang in suaktasak kik uh hi.
Zan ciang in suapui te in Paul le Silas sia Berea ah a zan a zan in paisak uh hi: tua mun a thet uh ciang in Judah mite i synagogue sung ah tum uh hi.
Hi te sia Thessalonica mite sang in a thinsung uh phazaw hi, thalawptak in thu ngai uh a, tua a ngai uh thu te a man le man ngawl nisim laithiangtho sung ah zong uh hi.
Tua ahikom amate sung ah mi tampi in um uh a; a zatak huai Greek nupi pasal tampi om uh hi.
Ahihang Thesslonica a om Judah mite in Berea khua ah zong Paul in Pathian thuhil hi, ci a heak uh ciang in, hongpai uh a, mipi te thawn uh hi.
Tua zawk pociang in suapui te in Paul sia tuipi sang ah paisak uh hi: ahihang Silas le Timothy sia Berea ah taamlai hi.
Paul a tha te in Athens dong tha uh hi: taciang Silas le Timothy sia manlangtak hongpai tu in thu nga uh a, pai uh hi.
Paul sia Athen pan Silas le Timothy te ngak in a om laitak, tua khuapi sung ah milim biakna bebek om hi, ci a mu ciang in, a thinsung sutha mama hi.
Tua ahikom Judah mite i biakna lampui te taw synagogue sung ah thu ki nial uh a, vanzuakna ah a kisikpui te taw nisim in ki nial uh hi.
Tua zawkciang in thu ngaisun thiam Epicurean te le Stoic te taw ki mu uh hi. Taciang pawlkhat te in, hi a papau sia bang son ziam? a dang pawlkhat te zong in, hisia pa sia ngamdang te pathian te thu son hi tu hi, ci uh hi: banghangziam cile Paul in amate tung ah Jesus le a thawkikna thu son hi.
Taciang amate in Paul man uh hi, taciang Areopagas ah paipui uh a, hi hilna thak na son te kote zong ka heak tu uh kisam ziam?
Banghangziam cile a tumdang te ka bil uh ah nong zasak hi: tua ahikom hi thu te i deina sia bangziam, ci ka he nuam uh hi, ci uh hi.
